Reviews.Title: “Excellent value and service”
Reviews.Author: waterbugdavis
Reviews.Content: This may be the best value in all of Orlando. It is very reasonably priced for all that is provided. The room was nicely furnished, with a very comfortable bed, good pillows, a microwave, mini refrigerator and free wi-fi. The desk staff were friendly, professional and very helpful with our questions. The hotel provides a free shuttle to Epcot (2 morning departures, 2 evening returns), and has a workout room and swimming pool. The complimentary continental breakfast has great variety, including oatmeal (with raisins, sliced almonds, brown sugar, honey toppings available), bagels, English muffins, fresh fruit, waffles, etc. It's a pleasant 10-15 minute walk to a low-key shopping center with a small grocery store and several restaurants/cafes, including a good locally-owned Italian restaurant. The hotel also offers complimentary baked cookies in the evening. Our only recommendation is that recycling containers be provided in the breakfast area. We'll stay here again the next time we're in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Good, but not all I expected from Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: chinchilla_mom
Reviews.Content: This hotel is nice and I would definitely stay here again. Great value for the area. I thought that the carpet needed cleaning and didn't really like walking on it with no shoes. Other parts of the room showed signs of wear. I would say it's time to paint and replace the carpet. The bathtub did not drain properly. At the end of a shower, I was standing in several inches of water. The bed was fine; room was very quiet. The breakfast was marginally up to Hampton Inn standards. My last day there I had to leave by 6:30 for a flight, so went down for breakfast about 6:10. There were no scrambled eggs out yet and they weren't put out until 6:25 or so. Another day there had been bacon, but it was all gone and never replaced while I was there eating. I look forward to a treat of having a donut when staying at Hampton Inn, but this one didn't have them. They did have a nice selection of muffins, bread, and some bagels, however. Overall, it was a nice stay, but just not quite up to the standards I associate with Hampton Inn. At that, it would still be my choice if going back to Orlando. Note that the traffic between the interstate and the hotel is horrid.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, excellent staff”
Reviews.Author: brainydr
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive, excellent staff and service. No suites available, but rooms are nice and well kept. Staff goes out of their way to make your time enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and experience”
Reviews.Author: Kimberly W
Reviews.Content: Great staff and location. I will definitely return again.

Reviews.Title: “Top notch hotel with service to match”
Reviews.Author: hikinggal
Reviews.Content: This was a return visit to this hotel. I must say I thought the service was even better than last time. I had a hair dryer get redhot, smoke and burn out my 1st morning. I called the desk and my hair did not have time to dry before a new one was installed. The main concern was for my safety-that I was OK. The front desk personnel were nothing short of awesome for my entire stay. My only "complaint" is this hotel does seem to cater to bus tour groups on occasion causing the breakfast area to be overrun with young people some mornings. My room was away from the group and I had no issues with too much noise etc. A very pleasant stay and I would definitely stay here again. Quite close to WDW downtown Disney area but about a mile off the main drag road so it is in a quiet area. Recommended without hesitation!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Megan H
Reviews.Content: My husband, two kids, and I went to Orlando for Spring Break to visit Disney. We checked in at about 9:30pm after being at Magic Kingdom all day long. The front desk attendant was very nice and got us checked in quickly. When we got to our room and unloaded our things, I got the kids ready for their showers and let me tell you I have been in many hotels and this bathroom was spotless. I have never seen a bathroom at a hotel that clean before and I was very impressed, kudos to the housekeeping team. The bathroom was very nice with a granite counter and good sized shower with an adjustable shower head, there were plenty of towels as well. The beds were fabulous and so comfortable. We brought out own pillows but if I had known how comfy the pillows were going to be I would have left it at home. The microwave and mini fridge were great conveniences and the flat screen TV was a nice touch. The next morning we were headed back to the parks so the complimentary breakfast was awesome. There was a lot of variety from waffles, to cereal, egg, oatmeal, bagels, toast, you get the idea! Very filling and the dining room had a nice atmosphere. We took the shuttle to the parks and it was an outsourced company but it was kind of worn down, but it got us to where we needed to be and back. When we got back from the parks there were warm cookies waiting on us....yum!! Then we made it to the pool area to relax a bit before dinner. The pool area was very nice and the hot tub was great for soaking after walking the parks. There were no towels but I notified the front desk attendant and she had some for us pretty quickly. There are a ton of places to eat around the hotel as well and some you could even walk to if you don't mind the walk. All around this place was more than I expected even after reading all the positive reviews. I would definitely stay here again. Thank you Hampton for making our trip wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you Monica!”
Reviews.Author: Disney17
Reviews.Content: The staff at the Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista were all very helpful, especially the breakfast staff who took a genuine interest in our well being! When one of our family members became ill, a staff member named Monica came alongside with compassion, caring, and understanding. She provided us with the knowledge about where to go to get the best medical help.The smiles on the faces of all the staff members made us feel welcome and at home. Thanks to everyone we dealt with from the front desk, breakfast staff, and cleaning staff! It was a pleasure staying there!

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: indyxray5
Reviews.Content: The Hotel was nice and had a good pool, although the water was very cold. We stayed here 2 nights before heading to our Disney Resort and the value was really good. They had a really nice Breakfast with many choices including the Mickey Waffles which the kids liked. We went to Sea World and Universal which were very close and Disney was only a few minutes away. The carpet was a little dated and my only other complaint was that the rooms are so small ! There were 4 of us, 2 adults and 2 young children and things were pretty cramped. We would stay here again just because of the value and location.

Reviews.Title: “Still the top choice for us.”
Reviews.Author: CamilleNewYorkCity
Reviews.Content: Orlando is a place for kids and families, but my husband and I decided to Disney World just as a couple, and we stayed at the Hampton Inn. Yes, there are kids all over the place. But our room was comfortable, a good bed, and it was quiet. Breakfast was a madhouse of "who can make a Mickey Mouse Waffle?", but cereal, yogurt, coffee, bagels and fruit were enough to get us started for the day. A quiet room? Breakfast included? Yes. I am a fan.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing time at Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: Rebecca G
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the hotel while my husband had a workday. I enjoyed the spotlessly clean fitness center, spent time reading in my room. I requested maid service wat 10 am so I could plan my day and that was done promptly on time. I requested help for the clock re-set and that was done promptly also. The breakfast time of 6 am-10 am was perfect for both of us. I especially liked the fresh fruit choices. I felt that all my needs were met there beyond my expectations. Thank you for opportunity to share. Maura at fron desk was friendly and professional, answering all my questiojns.

Reviews.Title: “Great value and location”
Reviews.Author: spoonsugar
Reviews.Content: Nothing is "cheap" around Disney but this hotel was a great value for the area and had great customer service. All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. We stayed 5 nights. Breakfast buffet was good with a wide variety including waffles, fruit, eggs, bacon, cereal, etc. The eggs did appear to be reconstituted. Location was just outside the parks. Room was standard. Nothing exceptional but was clean and comfortable. Internet access was easy and everything functioned well, including A/C. Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful, Clean hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Lovetotravel4208
Reviews.Content: This hotel was wonderful! It is a great choice when visiting Walt Disney World. It was extremely clean and conveniently located. The staff was wonderful. I would highly recommend this hotel. I have stayed in many hotels in the Disney area including Disney resorts and this is by far the best!

Reviews.Title: “Miss Maura and the other lady working at check-in 3/11/12(and the other front desk associates)”
Reviews.Author: Rusty C
Reviews.Content: Miss Maura and the other lady working along side her (sorry....failed to get your/her name) were exceptionally kind and helpful. Wonderful attitudes exhibited by these 2 ladies are what makes customers want to return to your establishment. Note: Everyone there was kind (from the front desk to the breakfast server to housekeeping!). It is my pleasure to provide this feedback. R Choate and Family

Reviews.Title: “One night stay at the Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: Jeanne C
Reviews.Content: The room was so great we spent the evening watching movies on HBO instead of Downtown Disney. We found a wonderful italian resturaunt nearby with stuffed pizza. Yum. The front desk was there to provide toothpaste and extra packets of coffee. The value and the comfort was just right.

Reviews.Title: “Excellence in Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: Marilyn H
Reviews.Content: We spent 3 nights at this location in February, 2012 - the staff was awesome (great sense of humour) and always smiling. Room was clean and comfortable...outside areas were great - we were able to sit out by the pool for the full day and enjoy the patio. The pool appeared to be warm enough as there were several business people swimming and the hot tub was put to great use. Would definitely recommend this especially for people visiting Disney Marketplace as it is in close proximity to all attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded my expectations”
Reviews.Author: Patrick M
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a great value for the budget minded and has excellent and friendly staff. Super clean bedding and the duvets are changed and cleaned fresh for every new guest. Bathrooms are very clean too. The breakfast buffet was more than adaquate. Hotel is nearby to plenty of dining options and all the Disney and Sea World attractions too. We stayed four nights and if I am ever in that area again this is the hotel I would choose.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed here the night before heading to the Disney resort.”
Reviews.Author: Jenbrain
Reviews.Content: Well. It was OK. Nothing special. Freezing cold pool for the kids. Lots of food on the buffet - none of it very good but there was variety. I thought our room was really on the cramped side.

Reviews.Title: “Best Customer Service Around”
Reviews.Author: Beth C
Reviews.Content: My best friend and I had a wonderful girls' weekend at the Hampton Inn in Orlando. The room was clean and spacious. We had a refrigerator and microwave, and the buffet was very good (Mickey waffles and everything). The location was ideal - just a quick drive to all the Disney parks. The best part about the hotel, however, was the front desk staff. They were so friendly and more than eager to make our stay as enjoyable as possible. They ran out of newspapers, so Jessica lent me her newly bought magazine to read. Later in the day, we smelled cookies baking, but we would be out of the hotel when they were given out to the guests, so Elizabeth saved us some with a very nice note. We had such a great time and will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “They went above and beyond what was reasonably expected.”
Reviews.Author: morrisburger
Reviews.Content: This review is posted to acknowledge the compassion that the management of this hotel extended to us. A tragedy in our family made it impossible to travel at the time that we had planned and booked our accommodation for. The management of Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista, Orlando Florida went above and beyond anything that we could have reasonably expected. We would also like to thank the customer service staff at Expedia.ca for their assistance. A strong recommendation based on the actions of management to make things right.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: fishlore1
Reviews.Content: Great location, close to everything. The staff, rooms and the whole experience was wonderful. Maura had a great personality and answered all our questions and was more than happy to help with all our needs. Breakfast was great and I would recommend this Hampton Inn to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, clean and comfortable, great breakfast”
Reviews.Author: DrewidMadison_NJ
Reviews.Content: Great location, lots of restaurants nearby, Great accommodations and great hot/cold breakfast buffet. Excellent price for room for quality you get here

Reviews.Title: “Could not have asked for anything more.”
Reviews.Author: momof2hard2please
Reviews.Content: It was amazing. Our flight was bumped up and we arrived at the hotel at 10:30 in the morning. Maura was fantastic and told me she would have housekeeping work on our room right away. She suggested that we get something to eat (breakfast was already over) and she would call when our room was ready. She did, it was. The entire staff was friendly and knowledgeable. Every morning someone went around to all the tables during breakfast, said hello, asked how the room and the stay is and would answer any questions. Maura said hello to us by name everyday and when my husband got a haircut several days later, she even noticed it and commented on it to him when he walked by at breakfast one morning. I would have absolutely no hesitation in staying there again, just for the service and staff!. The fact that they have the breakfast helps since our family went to Disney every day. The Disney property starts about 2 miles away and the first part you hit is downtown Disney. Maura even called us to say goodbye when we were leaving; it certainly wasn't to settle the bill since we had settled it by credit card at check in. I loved that the hotel has duvets instead of bedspreads that i would not allow my family to sleep with. Everything was clean. The only issue was a broken ice machine (4th floor & someone said 2nd floor as well) but I would assume this is temporary and you could get ice on other floors. Thepool is not heated. Ordinarily it would not matter, but since it had rained, the pool water seemed extra cold. Not unexpected, especially since we weren't sure if you could swim in February. I usually have some critical comments, but there is nothing critical to say.

Reviews.Title: “Special treatment!”
Reviews.Author: Dorothy F
Reviews.Content: My husband and I only stay at Hampton Inns. We wanted a last minute room and called about noon on a busy Saturday to find the hotel was fully booked. Jonas took our name and said he would call if there was a cancellation. How surprised and pleased we were when Lacey called about 5:30pm to say they had a room for us. We were visiting on the East Coast and wanted to stop halfway back home. The staff member checking us in at 10:30 pm warm so warm and friendly. Thank you to all!

Reviews.Title: “Tranquility!”
Reviews.Author: salli34
Reviews.Content: We made the best decision in a hotel near Disney World! The staff was friendly and helpful. Elisabeth and Maura entertained my children each day with paper and markers during breakfast, while I made Mickey waffles in the waffle maker. Staff would speak to guests and check to see if they needed anything. Rich from Guest Services was a wealth of information and tickets to the parks and shows. Housekeeping was great, as well, with fresh sheets and towels each day. There is always fresh baked cookies in the lobby each night for a snack with the complimentary coffee, tea or hot chocolate. I miss this the most! It is all the comforts of being at home away from home. We would definitely stay here again! The kids cannot wait to go back to Orlando and the Hampton Inn!

Reviews.Title: “Service Excellents”
Reviews.Author: Michael G
Reviews.Content: To the Managment & Staff I would very much like to express what a woundeful experience I had during my stay at the Hampton Inn and Suites in Orlando/South Lake Buena Vista, FL. Twelve of my buddies and I stayed at your establishment while we spent the week golfing at various courses throughout the area. I made new friends at your hotel like; Sherri, Mark, Justin, and Jennifer. Also, the service I recieved during my stay was excellent, your staff was kind and helpful. The three women that did breakfast every morning worked so hard and did a great job. Along with the maids and cleaning staff, who were pleasant and spotless. Your staff really treated me and my friends like family and i'm looking forward to booking my stay with you next year. Sincerely Michael G ( Mikey G.)

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Gehrig438
Reviews.Content: As Disney annual pass holders we have spent many weekends in Orlando. We have stayed at multiple Disney properties and many off site hotels. I was very pleased to Priceline into the Hampton Inn on our most recent visit in September 2011. The location is great for Disney park access and the surrounding areas. Hotel staff was great; rooms are clean and well appointed. The breakfast was great and the dining area is large enough to accommodate everyone on a busy weekend. Aside from a longer â€œresortâ€� style stay the Hampton Inn will be our new home in Orlando for all our future visits.

Reviews.Title: “Happy with Hampton”
Reviews.Author: SandyT101
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent six nights here is February, We have stayed here before, and it is one of our favorite Hampton Inns because of the great staff. We were greeted each time we walked into the lobby. Maura was funny and friendly--thank you, Maura. Jessica was fun to talk with. Manuel introduced himself in the hallway and said that if we had problems with the room (we had none) he would take care of it. WOW! Our room was clean and well laid out, with a fridge and microwave. We liked having the shelf below the sink to put our stuff, instead of putting it on the floor. The staff told us that the hotel would be getting renovations to guest rooms and public areas sometime this year. The included breakfast had hot and cold choices, including waffles shaped like Mickey Mouse. Coffee, tea and hot chocolate were available all of the time. This hotel is on a lovely street and is a 5 minute drive to Downtown Disney. There are many restaurants within a short distance--Denny's, McDonald's, Burger King, Olive Garden, Sweet Tomatoes. The hotel offers a free shuttle to EPCOT and to a local outlet mall. We think this is a great choice for a hotel near Disney.

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Disney”
Reviews.Author: baldharv
Reviews.Content: This Hampton was very close to EPCOT. The breakfast was very good, the hotel was clean. We had a little trouble with the A/C in the room, and the sleep timer on the TV remote did not work. But other than that, it is a Hampton and we know what to expect.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect base”
Reviews.Author: Southernowl
Reviews.Content: Hotel was perfect for our needs. We needed somewhere as a base and this was perfect. Disney 5 mins one way, Sea World 5 mins the other and Universal about 15 mins away. Have just spent a week at the hotel and it met our needs perfectly Staff were very friendly and attentive, Jessica always made time to stop and chat, always plesant. Check in was swift and quick. Breakfast was good and plentiful, setting you up for the day ahead. Room was clean and fresh towels daily. In places the hotel could have done with a fresh coat of paint but for our needs it couldn't really be faulted. If your'e looking for a hotel on a quite road and just away from all the attractions this hotel would be hard to beat - would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Irving L
Reviews.Content: Hotel very efficiently run. Staff friendly and responsive to any request. We were there two weeks and found hotel very clean and well maintained and managed. Hot breakfast great and served four hours from 6 to 10 A.M. Only complaint was that pool was unheated and not really usable in the winter months. Heat the pool and I could live there.

Reviews.Title: “Cookies are served at 7:00.”
Reviews.Author: tampabobl
Reviews.Content: Check-in was fast, friendly and efficient. The room was spacious and very well kept. I especially liked the mattress, very comfortable. The hotel provided free wifi which is almost a given these days but still nice. Breakfast was quite good, with hot food. The area was well kept. The evening cookies are served at 7:00 and we missed them but they smelled great. Overall, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel. Lovely accommodations. Decor was very nice”
Reviews.Author: Kathyes7
Reviews.Content: Would come back again without hesitation xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Reviews.Title: “very cozy stay”
Reviews.Author: Sweet M
Reviews.Content: My hubby and I were at the hotel Jan 2012 for 3 nights. We had a very comfortable stay, and the price for the room was amazing(booked through expedia). I love love that the blankets are washed for every guest! Usually when I go to hotels I bring my own, or I kick off the gross decorative blanket the first change I get. I'm not a germaphobe but that's just good sense to me. So thank you for a very nice clean stay. I had a little issue with the transportation to Universal Studios (our reason for going to Orlando) but the manager was very professional and by the time I got back home to Canada I received a phone call and email from another manager just to clear things up for me :) I would definitely go back! oh yes and FYI KobÃ© Japanese Steakhouse & Sushi Bar is within walking distance (maybe 5min for a slow walker) and the food was amazing!

Reviews.Title: “Great place for Disney visit!”
Reviews.Author: FloridaGirl124
Reviews.Content: One of the nicer Hampton Inns I've stayed in. Very helpful friendly staff. Standard (Hampton Inn) breakfast fare and that fabulous Robust Blend coffee. I always look for Hampton Inns as my first choice because of their standards of comfort and guest accommodation. This one is top notch!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant surprise.”
Reviews.Author: M S
Reviews.Content: Professional, friendly, helpful staff. Comfortable room, good amenities. I'm relocating and staff went above and beyond with lots of info on locations and maps, and jobs. It's a quiet and scenic location for an evening walk. Close to several restaurants. Great price. I will definitely stay here again and recommend to others. Business center was adequate.

Reviews.Title: “Problem with check out”
Reviews.Author: Th3Tr4v3ll3r
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hampton Inn for a week and, in general, it was a pleasant period. The rooms are clean and the hotel is located on a quiet and peaceful area. Disney and Universal are at fairly close distance. The breakfast is not great, but good enough for anyone who's just looking for a good snack before going out for fun. There are also a lot of places to have dinner nearby and the Orlando Premium Outlet is very close. They do not have safes in the rooms. The only problem I had was regarding the payment at the check out. They are not prepared to work with Visa Travel Money (VTM). In fact, it seems they do not know the existence of such a card, which works like a debit card for international travels. In my case, when I arrived to check in, they charged my debit card a value above of that I was supposed to pay at time of check out. At the end of my stay, they wanted to use my debit card again, like a credit card. I explained to them that the payment had already been completed and I showed them the extract of my bank account, which included the payment of the hotel. I explained that they had also charged me more than the correct value, and I would like to receive the excess amount back. They said they would investigate the situation and send me an email. That was two weeks ago and I have not received any contact since then. I will send them another email to get my money back. Anyway, here s a tip: do not use Visa Travel Money at check in. They do not know how to handle this type of card.

Reviews.Title: “We really liked The Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: djpickard
Reviews.Content: The hotel was comfortable and well appointed. We were attending a conference and can't comment on the pool area as we never went out there. The evening clerk was very helpful and friendly. Breakfast was your basic free hotel breakfast fare. We were happy that there was enough seating. I have read that there was limited shuttle service to The Parks, we found that the Lynx (may be spelled wrong) Bus service # 50 get you to some of The Parks. It goes right past the hotel and comes every half hour from about 6 am to almost midnight! I think the front desk should have these schedules for their customers. The beds were comfortable, but I am getting impatient with all hotels going with down comforters as their only option for covers....this is Florida, for heaven's sake! I also liked the fact that we could open our window, very rare for a hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous service!”
Reviews.Author: AML2012
Reviews.Content: We found the desk staff friendly and extremely helpful in finding excellent dining nearby. They also advised us on where to stay and where to avoid staying on our way home. Our room had great beds and seemed newly remodeled. The hotel provides free shuttles to WDW parks. We came down later in the free breakfast routine and it was very busy--but food was still plentiful and better than some other Hampton Inns.

Reviews.Title: “The Beds Were More Comfortable Than Disney!”
Reviews.Author: FireDiver443
Reviews.Content: Our travel got us to Orlando a day earlier than we'd planned. Despite the influx of runners in town for Disney's Marathon Weekend, we were able to find a room here on relatively short notice. The facilities & amenities were great. The room was spacious and clean and the beds were more comfortable than the beds we slept on for the rest of the weekend @ WDW. The hotel was located close to just about any restaurant you might want to go out to for dinner and the continental breakfast was delicious. We were glad we picked this one and would happily stay here again if our travel plans bring us this way.

Reviews.Title: “fine place, near disney”
Reviews.Author: joisey-joe
Reviews.Content: would have liked better channels and a fridge - but otherwise decent CLEAN hotel close to disney - along a quiet road which is a big plus in such a hopping, noisy place ... breakfast was fine, pretty much no complaints

Reviews.Title: “Time to renovate!”
Reviews.Author: PezziNewYork
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this location for one night before traveling farther south. The front desk staff were friendly and helpful at check-in. The rooms and public spaces are very worn. With so many options available in Orlando this facility simply does not shine!

Reviews.Title: “Very good”
Reviews.Author: Corinne-000
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very good The only problem was the room had a tendency to be a bit noisy not by people but by the ice machine outside the fridge and the air con !! Except for this very good value !

Reviews.Title: “Good for One Night Before Checking into Disney Resort”
Reviews.Author: Polarbearbeauty
Reviews.Content: This hotel was fine for one night. The front desk clerk at check in was very friendly. The elevators were beat up. The room was average & showing wear but as in the title basically a decent bargain for a one night stay before moving on to an upgraded hotel. We felt safe and it was really just a place to sleep and shower. The free breakfast offered a decent selection but it was crowded with lots of kids (to be expected at a hotel near Disney parks) and we had to take our food back to the room due to no table was available. The location was easy to find and plenty of places to eat in the nearby area as well as other tourist attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Solid vacation choice”
Reviews.Author: ccm17
Reviews.Content: This is a good, basic hotel. My room had 2 queen beds and a few extras. It wasn't huge, but was in good shape and got the job done for a holiday weekend getaway. There was a little confusion about free internet. The hotel website said access was only free in the lobby but not in the room, but I did have free access in my room (I used the wired version, in case that makes a difference). The staff was friendly, efficient, and helpful. They even called me after I got to my room to make sure I was satisfied and to see if there was anything else I needed. One weak point was the breakfast. This is a family area and each morning the buffet and seating were really packed with people and the food was slow to be restocked. The quality was just OK. So, yes there is free food, but it isn't great. There was free parking around the hotel. Getting to and from I-4 and Disney World or Universal does take a while, but is certainly no worse than waiting for a bus to come and go. The general area is almost all hotels, but there is also the Cross Roads shopping center nearby with many chain restaurants plus a "Goodings" grocery store and pharmacy. There don't seem to be any particularly good or special room views available. All in all, there is nothing really stand-out about this hotel, but it has good value for the money and seemed like a solid choice for a good stay (in the two times I have stayed here).

Reviews.Title: “Best deal in orlando area”
Reviews.Author: Ninty3saleen
Reviews.Content: For under 100.00 per night,super friendly staff,clean rooms and free breakfast how can you go wrong. Less than 5 min from downtown disney. Our second stay at this hotel and will stay there next time we are in orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Swiftgirl27
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time during our vacation to Disney World. This hotel is clean and comfortable. We went during Christmas break so it was quite crowded during breakfast but found that if we went first thing in the morning (before getting ready) is was pleasant. The line for the waffles gets backed up and it hold up the rest of the people serving up their food. I would recommend the waffles be moved to another area or better yet have a staff member making them to speed up the process. :) For the price we were very impressed with the overall service and hospitality. I would recommend this place in a heartbeat to friends and family. The shuttle service to the Disney is great too because it is the last on the route into the park and the first one to drop off on the way back at night! Took approx. 20 minutes in the minutes and only 10 at night to get home. During the first week of January there are only 2 shuttles in the morning and 2 in the evenings. The only other compliment was that the jacuzzi was just slightly warm, not hot. At least not when we attempted to use it in the evenings after a long day on our feet in the parks. All in all a great place.

Reviews.Title: “Will DEFINITELY be back!”
Reviews.Author: cbromberg
Reviews.Content: Spent just one night here and everything was great. The lobby and room were very clean. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Great value for the price!

Reviews.Title: “Housekeeping Not Concerned with Security!”
Reviews.Author: suzyque4
Reviews.Content: We had reserved three nights for a visit to Disney after being at the beach. This hotel was a surprising disappointment as most Hampton Inns are pretty consistent. We checked in around three and went up to our floor. There was a maid cart in the hall, no one was present, and we noticed that multiple room doors were cracked with the security bar pulled across to allow easy entry. Someone from the front desk called to see how our room was, and I asked her about all the rooms being open. The employee told me that that is how housekeeping services the rooms: in the morning the linens and towels are taken and in the pm the staff cleans the rooms floor by floor, leaving the rooms open for ease. CRAZY! There is no safe in the room. We could easily have walked into the room across from us and taken whatever we wanted. We had to hide our computers under the refrigerator. Plus the rooms are dated, AC loud, and the breakfast was very unpleasant--a real free-for-all. We checked out early.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: traveling4some
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 5 nights the beginning of January. The front staff was very helpful and friendly, and the homebaked cookies in the evening were a wonderful surprise. Any issues we had were addressed promptly and efficiently and housekeeping was great. The lobby area is really nice to hang around in and the breakfast offered is good enough. The egg's weren't the best though. The hotel's location is pretty good. A few things prevented a 5 star rating from us. These included the rooms being quite small, a very limited shuttle service, and things starting to look a little dated. Appeared to be a very popular place and we would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Close to Disney”
Reviews.Author: Runnermom3
Reviews.Content: We picked this hotel because it was a little cheaper than some of the other Hilton brands. So glad we did. It is VERY convenient to Downtown Disney and the hotel offers a shuttle to Epcot. The rooms were clean and the breakfast was good. It was a very busy weekend with the WDW marathon events. We did have trouble finding seating for our family to eat and food did get very low at times. One morning we didn't get breakfast because everything was gone and no one seemed to be in a hurry to bring any out. However, they did provide early breakfast for runners on race morning which was a plus! Overall, it is the average Hampton Inn. The pool, however, was like an ice bath. Good thing they had a hot tub! We will stay here again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Okay...would not stay here again”
Reviews.Author: NCRN_12
Reviews.Content: Over all the hotel is average, it is along the line of most Hampton Inns. The "free" internet is a joke. After many attempts trying to connect to the internet I called the front desk for assistance and was gave an 800 number to their IT department and told to call them myself. I did not realize I was an employee here and never understood why I was the one who had to call. Upon calling their IT department I was informed only a "limited" number of guest could use the internet at once and there was nothing that could be done until "some users where off line". We were able to use the internet 2 out of 5 nights. The shuttle service to the theme parks is also a joke. They have one van that transports only to Epcot around 0800 for one trip and does not go back to Epcot until 2200 for one trip. If you miss the van or do not wish to stay 14 hours you are SOL. The breakfast is average for Hampton Inns. The bed spread was dirty when we arrived it looked like someone had wiped chocolate on it. I would not stay here again, there are too many other hotels on the same street.

Reviews.Title: “Love it love it love.”
Reviews.Author: zoey1922
Reviews.Content: The hotel was great love it and will stay there the next time i am nearby.

Reviews.Title: “OK for a short Disney stay”
Reviews.Author: dhi50
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night prior to staying inside WDW. We have stayed at many Hampton Inns and this was a typical one. Location was fairly close to Downtown Disney but you had to drive to everything as there are no restaurants within walking distance. We gave it only 3 stars as we felt the hotel could use some freshening up (new paint, etc). I guess being near Disney it gets lots of wear and tear. Nothing really wrong with the hotel, but we would probably stay elsewhere in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Excelente opciÃ³n lo recomiendo”
Reviews.Author: Peluye
Reviews.Content: Bien localizado, limpio, buen desayuno, personal atento me encanto volverÃ­a a quedarme aquÃ­ lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: “Nice room, good price but bad shuttle service”
Reviews.Author: Josh J
Reviews.Content: The only think that i dislike about this hotel is the shuttle service for disney. First, we were 7 family that book at the same hotel. We were the first to arrive at the bus stop, but because we were a group, there said that we have to call a own cab to go at disney. I told him that we are all individual that paid for this hotel for a separate room and for the shuttle service and there is no reason to not get in. He said no way and scream to us. I decide to get in anyway, he let us in , but i was so stress out. The bus arrive around 9h00am in the morning and 11h00am to go at Epcot; at night, the return is at 6h30 and 10h00pm, it quite limited and seat are missing. I have give a complaint about the shuttle service at the hotel, There said that the shuttle service is a partner and not related to them, i response that there should change partner if it doesn't answer the needed ... I saw the bus for the other hotel near this one, and it was early and bigger...

Reviews.Title: “friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Alice T
Reviews.Content: good location! friendly staff excellent breakfast, we stay for a 5 days stay and enjoyed the holtel Disney was over crowed and had to shut down for a few hours

Reviews.Title: “Booked Tintin Promotion but got no tickets”
Reviews.Author: bridthetraveller
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel for 1 night on 8th December to include movie passes to tintin was told on check out they would be emailed within 14 days but I still have not received them. Hotel is close to shopping outlets but there is no resturants within walking distance. Clean hotel which has a nice breakfast area

Reviews.Title: “Usually great...”
Reviews.Author: momee111
Reviews.Content: We are Hilton Honors members and have stayed at many Hilton properties around the Orlando area (we are also Disney AP holders). We have stayed at this hotel about 3 times and prior to our last visit, it was great- which is why I am not giving it one star. The hotel is located about one mile from Disney parks so it is in a great location. The rooms are always clean and the staff is friendly. The breakfast is always up to Hampton's standards... except for this stay... the breakfast area was DISGUSTING. (there was food all over the floor and on empty tables) The only food that was available were muffins, everything else was empty. The juice and milk machines were broken and the only thing to drink was about one sip of orange juice in a pitcher on one of the counters. There were other guests that were also as horrified as we were. We saw two employees that were in the breakfast area, but must have been in LaLa Land because they seemed oblivious to the entire situation. Needless to say, we did not eat breakfast at the hotel and spent $40 for breakfast at IHOP for two adults and two children. I'm not sure if we will stay at this particular Hampton Inn again.

Reviews.Title: “highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: Lucy L
Reviews.Content: good location. clean room. excellent choices for breakfast. free parking and wi-fi. very affordable price.

Reviews.Title: “great disney getaway at hampton”
Reviews.Author: akf10737
Reviews.Content: just what you expect from hampton inn, consistency, good value, convenience

Reviews.Title: “Very Satisfied”
Reviews.Author: Barbara S
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were extremely pleased with our stay at the Hampton Inn. The entire staff was most helpful and courteous. Breakfast was great, and the location was so convenient. It is the best value in the area. I would reccommend this hotel, and we would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Ronen K
Reviews.Content: I think that after my last 3 nights stay at your hotel I will alway try to to stay at Hampton Hotels, Breakfast (free of charge) was beyond expectentions, service was amazing, perfect location, great room, I felt like home, thanks for the warm hospitality. Ronen K

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel in Orlando.”
Reviews.Author: A_Florida_Traveler
Reviews.Content: The Hampton Inn is nice hotel to stay in while visiting Orlando. It's close to all the major parks and attractions. There is a great breakfast in the morning and the cost is much lower than many other hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Memorable Experience”
Reviews.Author: Nida K
Reviews.Content: I want to start of by saying that the location is great, all the tourist sites are close by. We had a blast here at Orlando, and most of all loved our stay at Hampton. The staff was the friendliest ever and greeted us with such kindness. The morning breakfast is clean hot and ready on time. There are so many options and a great way to start your day. The location of the hotel was amazing; my husband loved that the most. Even though we always missed out on the cookies they start serving around 6ish, it was impossible to get them with all the orlando fun. The rooms are clean and very cozy!. Hampton made our stay very memorable Regards The Khan Family

Reviews.Title: “Good location, great price and service!”
Reviews.Author: Megan H
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights. The room was a good size, and we had no issues with outside noise. It was great to have a fridge in the room! The breakfast was wonderful! The location was good. We were no more than 20 minutes from all Disney Parks, Sea World, and Universal. The shuttle provided only goes to Epcot, and has limited pickup times but still provides access to all Disney Parks. Would stay here again. The staff was friendly and helpful with maps, directions.

Reviews.Title: “great price and good service”
Reviews.Author: John5307
Reviews.Content: Had a great time at Hampton Inn (Palm Pkwy) last weekend. The staff was very helpful and courteous. Rooms were clean and beds were comfy! also had refridges and micros in the rooms... The breakfast was a not as good as other Hampton Inns... a little slow in replenishing items that were gobbled up by the guests... although the 24/7 coffee was enjoyable when we got in from a long drive! For the price, it is a solid bargain! I will definately stay again here.

Reviews.Title: “Most pleasant stay at Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: Christina B
Reviews.Content: my family and I were extremely satisfied with the services that the Hampton Inn Orlando offered us. Most important was how clean the whole facility was. The beds and bathroom were ready for us to enjoy our stay. Microwave and mini fridge in case we needed to use for food we brought to the hotel. A/C is tricky as you have to crank it to 60 degrees to get the air cold. Complimentary Wi-Fi and breakfast was a plus!! Breakfast area was spacious and very well layed out. Mickey waffles for the whole family!!! Nutritious items for the health saavy: fresh fruit, yogurt, breads, cereal, oatmeal, juice and coffee. Let me tell you about the coffee station: it has variety in falvors, creams, sugar, hot chocolate, and tea. Garbage bins were accessible as were the napkins for kid spills. Staff was very welcoming. Location was perfect next to great restaurants. We will recommend and go back.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay”
Reviews.Author: cody52
Reviews.Content: We were greated by a friendly and accomodating hotel staff. The rooms are large, very clean, with a big TV, microwave and refrig. We loved the complimentary breakfast that had so many choices, one couldn't go away hungry! Also, coffee and tea was offered 24/7. The hotel was quiet, too. It was located between DisneyWorld and Universal so it was the perfect place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel made our vacation perfect by providing my family with a completely tranquil setting to relax and have our every need ”
Reviews.Author: dionandtara
Reviews.Content: From the moment we checked in the hotel and staff were entirely welcoming and accommodating. The staff amaze me in how they manage an influx of visitors with ease. There was never a line at the front desk. Every little thing we needed that we forgot, they provided for us. The breakfast is wonderful and again the staff keep the buffet full of warm food-with what appears to be an effortless manor-serving the entire hotel. The grounds are immaculate and the rooms are spotless. We were amazed how often and thoroughly our room was cleaned. The pool is beautiful, clean and so inviting and relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “Better than i expected”
Reviews.Author: Julie A
Reviews.Content: Great staff, breakfast was wonderful. Room was clean and updated. Would def stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice staff, very clean”
Reviews.Author: Jeff G
Reviews.Content: Nice front desk staff, good Hampton Inn breakfast, very clean

Reviews.Title: “Average. A Little Disappointed.”
Reviews.Author: Red_Dolphin-Media
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for one night on November 24, 2011. I stay at Hilton brands a lot and am a GoldVIP...this stay unfortunately proved disappointing. I normally equate Hampton to the mid-class "Hilton Garden Inn" type of hotel. This one did not live up to that expectation, Positives: - Clean - Free parking - Comfortable bed - Nice TV - Good breakfast - Nice location, a bit secluded on Palm Parkway. 10 mins from Downtown Disney by car. Negatives: - No convenience store (not even pantry near front desk) - No acknowledgement of GoldVIP status, no snack, no water as I usually get at Hampton Inn - No laundry - Very weak wireless internet signal - No in-room safe - Mildewy bathroom - Vending machine from the 1950s - Weak lighting in rear parking lot - Persistent housekeeper who kept knocking on my door my last morning just prior to check out time, even with the DND sign on the door. With so many choices in the area, I likely will not return to this property.

Reviews.Title: “Not as good as the other hampton inn”
Reviews.Author: Donh67
Reviews.Content: Lived here for 4 days and feel it's not as good as the other hampton inn lived in Florida. The reason might be the hotel is kind of old and you can see the carpet is stained and especially the bath room are kind of stinky. I smell it around and finally find it came from the water. But my wife insist it's from toilet. The front desk are generally friendly and nice. When i check in, i asked for to credit the stay for my HHONORS and was told can't since i booked through Expedia.com. You know i was trying to book through Hampton Inn.com but it only showed me Expedia as i booked hotels through tripadvisor and it only shows me the cheapest one.

Reviews.Title: “What a splendid stay!”
Reviews.Author: Doradog
Reviews.Content: The hotel was great. We liked the room and the location but it was the wonderful staff that made it so great. We arrived early before the room was ready however we knew we would be busy all day. The staff took care of everything so that all we had to do was have a great night's sleep Thank you so much Jessica.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice for theme parks & golf”
Reviews.Author: garyb2
Reviews.Content: We spent 6 nights here for the LPGA tournament as well as 3 days at Disney. The hotel is in an excellent, quiet location off the main tourist areas. Very comfortable room and very complete breakfast with 3 types of coffee, juice, eggs, waffles, fruit, cereal, muffins, toast, yoghurt, etc. They even varied the selection knowing many people spent more than one night. Staff was very pleasant and helpful about area activities. Also provides coffe, microwave and refrigerator in the rooms. Only downside was their shuttle only goes to Epcot, not the other parks, so a car is essential. We will go back!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing staff!”
Reviews.Author: Guidoncio
Reviews.Content: Hampton Inn has been always in my USA vacations. Great bed, service and good breakfast. The amazing staff is a plus! Special thanks to Dee Dee, a life saver!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and the price is right.”
Reviews.Author: casinogal
Reviews.Content: Hampton Inn LBV went above and beyond what I expected for a two night stay.Thinking we were going to be late for check in I called and Jessica assured me that things would be fine. Sure enough when we arrived Jessica was so accomodating and actually moved us to the first floor which helped greatly. Very close to the parks we were going to and there are plenty of restaurants in the area to cover everyones needs. The morning breakfast was a plus when you are scrambling to get to a park at opening time; also loved the fact that coffee was ready for a early riser. I would recommend this hotel for all that need a quite place to rest but love the convenience of being close to everything.

Reviews.Title: “Good times bad traffic”
Reviews.Author: David B
Reviews.Content: We travel often and always stay at the Hampton Inn. The only problem I had with this stay had nothing to do with your hotel but the location was surrounded by terrible traffic. It was difficult to come and go in a timely manner. The hotel side of it was excellent. Staff, cleanliness, and breakfast were all excellent as always at the Hampton inn. I give you an a++ and the traffic light patterns around you an f. See you soon

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel and great staff”
Reviews.Author: Samsouza
Reviews.Content: We had a great time in this hotel. The hotel is located in a quiet area with a lot of opitions of good restaurants around it. The rooms are very comfortable and clean and the staff are very nice - look out for Jessica. She was very patient with us and gave nice tips.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel to visit the parks”
Reviews.Author: millenniumbridge
Reviews.Content: Hampton Inn Hotels are normally were good but this one even exceeded our expectations. Staff are very nice. We arrived very early in the morning and they gave us a room right away and we could also had breakfast as soon as we arrived. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, breakfast is very rich and the best part of it are the Mickey Mouse waffles that you can make yourself! There is a counter where you can buy tickets to the park ($5 more expensive than at the gate though). They have a shuttle to Epcot but if you go to Orlando rent a car and drive to the parks, this hotel is in a good location and you can easily reach Disney and US. Price is very reasonable, very good value for your money.

Reviews.Title: “clean, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: yung b
Reviews.Content: Responsive staff to all concerns. Look out for Robert - super nice guy, excellent care.

Reviews.Title: “"Great, great and really great"”
Reviews.Author: RainbowPeter
Reviews.Content: Great standard of accommodation, great prices, great facilities, geat breakfast and great service. What else could you ask for? On our 3 week trip from our home in Australia to the USA and Canda, this establishment really stood out as the best of the best and excells in everyway. No more needs to be said!

Reviews.Title: “November 2012; Stayed 2 different times”
Reviews.Author: cn1429
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this property a 2 times in the past month and few other times this year. I think most comments are right on for the property you read in the other reviews. Since it is a fine property let me give you the only possible negative things. I noticed from Feb 11 to Nov 11 that the towels and linens have aged a lot. Very thin. They need replacing. Thats concerning. Secondly its such a popular property breakfast in the am is a food fight or fight for food. Im not into elbows with strangers going for the same muffin. Ill stay here again but won't eat breakfast there. Staff appears to be trained well and property aging well.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: BahiaMakem
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel for 4 nights based on the many positive reviews and the price range and I was not disappointed. The front desk went out of their way to help by signing in some packages for me that I had ordered before our arrival.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel does more than the job.”
Reviews.Author: David S
Reviews.Content: Excellent option to spend nights when visiting Disney World when you have got a car. The hotel is close to Downtown Disney (8 minutes by car). However it will take you 20 minutes to reach the Magic Kingdom with the car. The room we had (for 2 adults and 2 kids) was very clean and seems to have been recently renovated. The breakfast is more than fair in comparison to same standard chain hotels. A mall is very close with lots of restaurant more affordable than in the Disney parks. Rooms have microwave and refrigerator which is another option. Staff was super kind and nice. No regret at all for the price paid per night: USD 79.00 + USD 10.00 (tax) Impossible to beat this deal with an excellent stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great option for everything Orlando has to offer”
Reviews.Author: loxias27
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 3 nights in June (bit late with this review, but better late than never). I had room 406 (view over the pool) and it was a great stay - under $100 a night to be in the centre of the action. It's a great location with ample free parking and the staff are friendly and helpful. I checked in late in the afternoon having driven up from Miami and was given a warm welcome, lots of advice for places to go nearby and information about the hotel facilities. My room was spacious, comfortable and clean, with complimentary wi-fi. A good selection of leaflets on every floor and by reception allowed me to plan my trip to Disney - I could even get my tickets at the front desk if I wanted, which would be great for families wanting to avoid queues. The hotel is right off the Interstate, which means no more than 15 minutes to any of the Disney parks or Universal Studios, International Drive, and the shopping malls - which meant you can fit a lot in to each day. I found it was nice to be able to leave the I-Drive and Disney resorts to go back to my quieter hotel each night - even though it is located on a drive full of big hotels. Actually a pleasant walk down to the tacky souvenir land at the end of the road. There was a nice pool, which was fairly big and had lots of loungers round it. Certainly a nice way to unwind. I also found my room very quiet - for a hotel with so many children staying in it, I wasn't bothered by any noise once! I will definitely stay here again when visiting Orlando - you can't really get more for your money.

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel close to Disney”
Reviews.Author: brianandanne2002
Reviews.Content: We arrived late in the evening, but we were able to check-in quickly. The hotel is very close to Disney, which is why we chose it. We just needed a place to crash before we started our Disney vacation. The gal at the front desk was very friendly and very helpful. She helped me get some foam cups from the breakfast area so I could make some hot tea. While the room does have a mini fridge and a microwave, I don't see how a family could stay there long term. One or possibly two people, not a family. The rooms are very small and there is little room for storage. The decor is very worn and the beds are hard. The free hot breakfast has eggs, sausage and bacon, rolls and the usual breakfast staples.

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Inn appraisal”
Reviews.Author: david s
Reviews.Content: Cannot fault this hotel. Good self service breakfast, friendly and helpful staff. The room had tv and brew facilities and was kept very clean. Stayed 10 nights. Free parking and facilities to book theme parks and other trips.

Reviews.Title: “Good place close to Disney”
Reviews.Author: RJ24R2
Reviews.Content: Have stayed at many places billed as more stars or higher class (Hilton garden, raddison, doubletree) in the area and found this property to be one of the better ones. Breakfast included, as is norm now at all hamptons, and plenty of free parking. Also outdoor pool and hot tub. The last 3 not the norm at the "on property" chains that are just up the street (up to $12 a day less than a mile away). They also had a flyer for a shuttle to epcot, we did not take, but was offered. Quiet and good clean comfortable room. Will definitely be back. Can walk to restaurants down sidewalk about 1/4 mile. Is a short drive to parks but hardly further than the "on property" Hilton, doubletree, and wyndham.

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Inn is consistently good”
Reviews.Author: TravelMusic37
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for three nights in October for a 'girls weekend get away'. This Hampton Inn was very conveniently located to everywhere we wanted to go. Our room was clean and quiet. Air conditioning, tv, coffee maker, hair dryer, and microwave were all in good working order. I always like the convenience and choices of the included breakfast as well. All of the staff were very friendly and provided good restaurant suggestions as well as driving directions. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “friends staying at $300 a night hotels envied us.”
Reviews.Author: Libby M
Reviews.Content: We were attending a political convention and friends who booked $300 rooms at the convention site were very disappointed that they did not even have coffee in their rooms. We were delighted with your wonderful service and the excellent breakfast every morning. Your staff always greeted us with a "good morning" and smiles. Thank you for your thoughtfully prepared breakfasts and especially your excellent "robust" coffee. Our 3-night stay was the greatest.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Barbara M
Reviews.Content: I arrived early and was promptly checked in as they had a room ready. Everything was clean, bright and in great condition. I spent the afternoon by the pool reading in the shade. The setting was quiet and peaceful and quite delightful. I used the shuttle service to Epcot the next three days and found it very convenient and especially nice at the end of the day to sit back and let someone else fight traffic. The business center was easy to use and didn't charge for our boarding passes to print. The room was quiet and the service excellent. We hope to stay there again when we return to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Family get together for a 70th birthday.”
Reviews.Author: aldona S
Reviews.Content: There could be no better place to stay with a large family get together than this Hampton Inn. Everyone could meet at breakfast time all sharing a super great FREE breakfast. The variety of food and always an abundance made everyone's day start off happy and contented. The Disney waffles were a great hit, not only for the kids but also for the adults. Having fresh coffee always available - it made us all feel like home. The always clean area where we could meet and sit and talk with each other was perfect. Everyone was so kind.......there wasn't one employee at this Hampton that wasn't exceptional. They all were so helpful, courteous. - just a super staff. Thank You to all for making our stay perfect. Aldona

Reviews.Title: “The wonderful staff sets this hotel apart”
Reviews.Author: Julie L
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Hampton Inn for 5 nights. The room was clean, quiet, and comfortable and the breakfast buffet varied and tasty, but what really set this hotel apart was the staff. The gentleman who cleaned our room was friendly and helpful. The two people we saw caring for the breakfast buffet were quick to fill any depleting supplies, clean up any messes and pleasant no matter what time we arrived for breakfast or how busy they were. When we wanted coffee in the evening to go with the cookie offered by the smiling front desk staff, it was there in the lobbyâ€¦hot and actually quite good. We were spoiled rotten by the end of the stay. The people at Hampton Inn made my husbandâ€™s business trip a pleasure!

Reviews.Title: “Good value in the off-season”
Reviews.Author: 4 Joyful Travel
Reviews.Content: We stayed for two nights in October for $72 per night. The spacious room had a comfortable bed and chairs, good temperature control, a large mini-fridge with freezer, a small microwave, and a large flat screen TV. The hotel was quiet and we got a good night's sleep. The bathroom had plenty of counter space, good lighting, and an excellent shower head, but the fan was obnoxiously noisy. The breakfast buffet was fair but not great: processed-tasting hot items, good waffles, canned fruit, and the usual carbs. We appreciated the free access to a computer to check email. This hotel is in an excellent location, just a mile or so from the entrance to the Disney complex. We did not use the hotel shuttle. There are many chain and other restaurants nearby. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “breakfast good....pool not heated for cooler months”
Reviews.Author: Laura B
Reviews.Content: I would stay here again but the pool was cold...was told by staff that it was a heated pool. The hot tub was not much warmer either. The shower curtain was not big enough for the shower. But the breakfast was very good and the kids LOVED the mickey waffles. Staff was nice. Neighborhood was nice. Very close to disney and universal....between each.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Sam M
Reviews.Content: Typical Hampton Inn hospitality. Not fancy but a great solid place to stay comfortably. Rooms are clean, everything works. The free breakfast is unbeatable. Great bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: “we made a great choice!”
Reviews.Author: ddg103
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights last summer (aug 2010)We were just having a quick trip to Disney and Sea World for 1 day each.I was very happy with the advanced purchase rate and the ratings I saw on here when we got there we weren't disappointed...The hotel staff were friendly,the room clean and comfortable,they had a great breakfast buffet in the morning and super close to everything! Lots of resturants close by, Disney outlets,the parks,Downtown Disney was just a straight drive right down the street you only had to cross the highway to be where the DTD hotels were at twice the cost.We had a great stay and would highly recommend it for anyone looking for a good nights sleep off property.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient to Everything”
Reviews.Author: TravelYoder
Reviews.Content: The Hampton Inn is very close to I-4 in Orlando, so it was easy to find. We went for a long weekend to visit a family member who is a Disney Cast member for 5 months. His housing was close by, so he could join us for breakfast at the hotel (delicious) before we set out for our day in the Park. The front desk was always friendly and helpful, the linens were clean and the room tidy. We never used the pool or spa, but the exercise room was more than sufficient for a quick workout before dinner one evening. There is a shuttle to the parks - as parking costs about $14.00/day at Disney, this is a big perk.We will definitely plan to return to this Hampton Inn next time we are in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Oct. 2011 trip”
Reviews.Author: Jose B
Reviews.Content: Location, location, location....great service, free breakfast. Stayed at this hotel several times, it never let me down.

Reviews.Title: “Hampton - Orlando”
Reviews.Author: MountainMan2011
Reviews.Content: Great hotel with great service. the front desk staff was wonderfully helpful. Good breakfast bar to get you going quickly in the morning, good location for quick service to disney. Had a pool for the kids. We did not take advantage of the shuttle as we had a rental car. Overall, a good value for the choice of where to stay offsite Disney in orlando.

Reviews.Title: “No brainer - free breakfast and wi-fi, big rooms, they wash bedspreads after every customer!”
Reviews.Author: CruisingSwedes
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel after reading the reviews here on TripAdvisor. So happy we stayed there! We paid about $60/night which was great. For a family of 4 to include free breakfast, internet, and 24 hour coffee/tea, fridge in the room and microwave, it was a great value. Big rooms, great air-conditioning, very clean, NOTHING to complain about. There was a special note on the bed that I loved reading - they wash the bedspreads after every single guest. That is amazing considering most hotels don't. We had just done a 2 week cruise and every day I ripped that bedspread off the bed - those things are filthy! Downtown Disney was minutes away so obviously very convenient to go to. Also the Prime Outlet Mall on Vineland was just minutes away too. Spent some quality time there as well LOL :) Breakfast is adequate, and elaborate compared to some continental breakfasts. They have 2 fantastic Mickey Mouse waffle makers that my daughter loved! The pool was not exciting, but we weren't there for a pool. I'll take cleanliness, space, a big breakfast, free wi-fi, and big bathrooms over a pool any day. The pool wasn't bad, just not exciting (no slides, etc, as we saw at some of the other hotels we passed by that looked like they had mini water parks). I would absolutely stay here again and will recommend it to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Average, can't complain for the price”
Reviews.Author: Dmmbk
Reviews.Content: Hampton inn is a cheap way to stay. Location is close to theme parks. You pretty much get what you pay for. Adequate rooms, adequate breakfast, adequate property. If you're looking to save a dime, you've found your match. Make sure to check the beds/linens for stains before sleep!! Always book directly through the hotel as you can normally barter. Overall, cheap way to stay.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful value”
Reviews.Author: pearl p
Reviews.Content: front desk is very friendly and helpful. have always been very accomodating. the housekeeping staff is also very warm and cordial. the staff responsible for the breakfast buffet is fast, efficient, generous. always greeting you with a smile. i like that it has an adequate size refriegerator and microwave in the room. they serve coffee 24 hours in the lobby;)

Reviews.Title: “Our trip to Disney World”
Reviews.Author: Kathy C
Reviews.Content: We always like to stay at a Hampton.. Breakfast is good and beds are comfortable. This one was no different. Staff real helpful to answer questions.

Reviews.Title: “Decent stay for the moderate Budget”
Reviews.Author: tedman007
Reviews.Content: Stayed 9/19/11. . not bad decent.. good for money.. not perfect.. but, clean, safe, less expensive to sleep. have decent, coffee breakfast , shower and go back to the parks. Recommend. In my opinion...Fall season... nite stay between $60 and $80 very good deal. I am picky and had to problems al all.. good luck also, the Palms Galleria of 192 and maingate was almost as good for total of $60 per nite taxes and everything.. Note: remember.. taxes are high about 13% and some hotels add "resort" fees.. total B.S. but what you gonna do??

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: AnalidaPanama
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista from 9/10/11-9/17/11. Our decision had been based on reviews found on tripadvisor and we couldnÂ´t agree more with the excellent reviews! Among the many benefits: Nice room, fridge and microwave in the room, excellent location (very close to Disney parks), complementary and very complete breakfast, free parking/internet/business center/newspaper, storage for luggage if needed, safety deposit box. It also has a pool and gym. The staff is friendly. We even bought Disney tickets to the parks with the concierge, avoiding waiting in line to buy them at the park. The one thing I would improve on would be the wi-fi signal in the room. It was rather weak. But other than that small detail, everything else was great. We would definitely stay there again. Congratulations on an excellent job!

Reviews.Title: “Theme parks and more”
Reviews.Author: silvergirl 17
Reviews.Content: Hampton Inn LBV was a great little hotel. It had nice rooms. I requested a quiet room and It really was the quietest room I've ever had. It would be best for off season because the pool is tiny but adequate. If any amount of people are at the pool, it would be too crowded. The offered breakfast was not great but not the worst that I've had and it was ready early. The maid service was irregular. We came back from the theme parks at 4pm and the room wasn't done but a call to the front desk and they came immediately. That happened twice, And, the fore alarm sounded one night but it wasn't a real fire. The staff are all very friendly and the front desk people are all very caring. It's in a great location, easy to access all the theme parks, Downtown Disney and the outlets.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: hcrottler
Reviews.Content: The Hampton properties are first class in all ways. the rooms are spacious, the fitness area is well equipped and the breakfast is excellent. The parking is easy and safe for all travelers. The internet access and business center is just right for the traveller. It is a quiet place to rest and use as a base of operations for a visit.

Reviews.Title: “Right place, right time.”
Reviews.Author: Chapmanbilly
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night following lengthy plane journey from London. Location and parking were a breeze, check-in was painless, room was spacious and clean, bed was comfortable and bathroom was spotless. Breakfast was adequate and we moved on mid-morning. Hotel was a perfect start to our vacation. OK, it's not Four Seasons, but with the price I paid I had no grounds for complaint. Would not hesitate to use again and no qualms about recommending to others.

Reviews.Title: “Great Price and Great Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: dladomirak
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here for one night during a quick trip to Disney. The rooms were large and clean. The beds very comfortable but the best part was the Free Continental breakfast, It was awesome. The Hampton Inn was a pleasant surprise and we will be back again!

Reviews.Title: “Great staff”
Reviews.Author: bcbuzzafsu
Reviews.Content: The cleaning staff went above and beyond what we have come to expect from hotels. They put our shoes away and made the beds with pillows we brought from home. Everything had a nice personal feel to it. Breakfast is great too. Hard to beat. We stay here every time we go to Disney since it is like 4 miles from Epcot plus its always a pleasant experience. The from desk staff are helpful land patient too. They gave us directions to WalMart so wouldn't have to buy rain ponchos in the Disney parks.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel! Good Deal!”
Reviews.Author: rhettoric
Reviews.Content: As with all the Hampton's in which I have stayed, this was very nice, had lovely personnel and was in a good location. As occasionally happens, the breakfast left something to be desired but we enjoyed our stay. Kudos to Jonas! Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value! Highly Recommended!”
Reviews.Author: Peter_A_S_2011
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for six nights in late August 2011. This was a great base for visiting the theme parks and other attractions in the area. Our room was very CLEAN, and beds were very comfortable to sleep in. We felt safe and comfortable while we were here. The included free breakfast was above average and included hot items daily. We would highly recommend the Hampton Inn for anyone spending their days/evenings at the theme parks/attractions in Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “fantastic location for all major attractions”
Reviews.Author: Tracy Y
Reviews.Content: Great location, rooms clean, staff friendly, good free breakfast, 24 hour free hot drinks, free internet. Pool clean, hot cookies at night. Would definitly stay here again although it was a bit noisy with guests banging doors on the Friday night, what they were doing were leaving the door on the safety catch and moving from room to room and just letting the door shut behind them. Shopping outlets near by. Good restaurants near, Chillis, Orlando Ale house, Olive Garden, Sizzlers, giordanos just to mention a few. Downtown Disney a 5 minute drive away. Great travel planner person in reception to help with your holiday questions regarding where to visit etc If you are doing Disney/universal on a budget I would definity reccomend the Hampton Inns

Reviews.Title: “Definately Recommend”
Reviews.Author: Gerald_Alison
Reviews.Content: This Hotel is managed by a professional team who provide service to a high standard. Reliable, friendly and professional. Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Gorillasftw
Reviews.Content: Check-in was friendly and fast. The rooms were clean and tidy the whole time(modern too) Breakfast was amazing especially the Mickey Mouse waffles! Would definitely come again!

Reviews.Title: “Great off property location for Disney”
Reviews.Author: 1cutemom
Reviews.Content: We spent a couple extra days in Orlando after a business trip to take our daughter to a couple parks. We went to Island of Adventure and Epcot so chose this hotel for its location to the parks and right off I4. We arrived at 8pm and was greeted with cookies at thee front desk and got to our room quickly. The hotel was very clean, staff friendly as expected with Hampton. We didnt use the pool but looked nice and clean. The breakfast was great with all options including mickey waffles. Our frig did not work in the room which I figured out late but they fixed it promptly while we were out the next day. Great to have free Wi-Fi and computers to access for airline check in and print boarding passes without being charged for printing. One great point to this hotel is it is very close to all parks and there are probably 30 restaurants in the area. You can walk but since we did MILES at the parks we drove. We ate a perkins and Olive Garden which were both great service with the amount of people in the restaurants at 9pm. Also 2 grocery stores within 1/2 mile of the hotel. Would definately stay here again! Suprised by the $70 rate verses the disney $200 per night. Since we have a teen she didnt care about the disney hotel so we could spend more money in the parks etc.

Reviews.Title: “We will be back”
Reviews.Author: lilipretto
Reviews.Content: We stayed for five nights. The room was very clean. The front desk was very helpful and friendly. The staff in general was very friendly. The hotel is very well located, a few minutes from downtown Disney, and Walt Disney World and Seaworld. The breakfast was very good!! We will definitely came back.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: chkotur
Reviews.Content: We had a room with 2 queen beds, very quiet (4th floor, away from the elevators) and very clean. Breakfast was great! The Mickey shaped waffles were a hit with our kids and a perfect way to start off a day at Walt Disney World! We also appreciated the convenience...very close to the WDW parks and to restaurants and shopping. We will definetly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Ants all over our room!”
Reviews.Author: magnme2001
Reviews.Content: We arrived in Orlando late and needed a place to stay for a couple of nights before we could check in at our Disney hotel. I booked the hotel on one of those travel sites (which by the way does not tell you that prices are subject to change at anytime until you check out) Anyway... when we arrived we checked in and fell asleep right away. The next morning I noticed a couple of ants in the bed with me. I brushed them off and really didnt think too much about it until we returned to the hotel later that night. We got ready for bed, laid down and I happened to look at the floor where there were literally hundreds of ants crawling around. We called the front desk and after a while they decided to put us in another room at 11:00 at night without offering us so much as a cart to use to move our luggage. When we got to the next room a few floors up we could see that the carpet had big squares cut out and crudely replaced (looked like someone was trying to fumigate under the carpeting) The next day at check out we asked to speak to a manager and for a discount since we were put out. We were offered no sort of an apolig. and a very minimal discount. In fact after the manager raised the rate we were given on the travel site and took off the discount we really ended up with no discount at all. What a disappointment . The hotel looked so pretty and inviting when we pulled up.

Reviews.Title: “Reliable hotel”
Reviews.Author: edgar49er
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for the price. Clean rooms, Free breakfast, free WiFi, free parking, good location. Less than 2 miles from downtown disney. 8 Miles from Universal but no need to get on the express way, just take Palm Parkway/Turkey Lake Rd north. Decent pool, with small jacuzi. No hidden charges. WiFi was a little slow for my taste but free. Will visit this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for the price and location”
Reviews.Author: Ric M
Reviews.Content: Would defintely stay here again and recomend to family and friends Breakfast wasnt the best but it was free and great for the price

Reviews.Title: “Overall ok but smell of disinfectant in room overwhelming”
Reviews.Author: graham67fla
Reviews.Content: As usual, the facilities of Hampton Inn were satisfactory. However, upon entering our room the smell of cleaning disinfectant was overwhelming. When I called down to the front desk, I was informed that this was the last room in the hotel with a king sized bed. So I opted to remain in the room. However, it made for a fairly unpleasant stay and I awoke with a slight respiratory issue. Fortunately that seemed to clear as the day went on post leaving the building. I am all for cleanliness, but go easy on the toxic cleaning products.

Reviews.Title: “Good TIme”
Reviews.Author: DSM06
Reviews.Content: My family and I were treated with respect and kindness. We look forward to staying here if we visit Orlando, FL again.

Reviews.Title: “A standout”
Reviews.Author: roadtrip025
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Hampton Inn Orlando/Lake Buena Vista on August 1st. We were on our way to Naples and needed to stop around midnight. The hotel was impressively clean and all employees were friendly and quite helpful. Considering the price it is an outstanding value.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect rooms that wont send you broke!”
Reviews.Author: chaddd
Reviews.Content: When we booked this hotel and about $70 a night, we did not expect very much at all. This hotel was fantastic! the staff were super helpful and it was perfectly adequate for our stay around all the parks. This hotel is a real family friendly hotel with a happy atmosphere and within great easy access to all the parks.. And downtown Disney only a short $15 cab ride away. highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Same old Hampton Service”
Reviews.Author: ReesyMadison
