Reviews.Content: Not that it's a bad thing, I think it's because of Hampton's consistency that makes it well received. Anyways hotel is great, location is ideal and staff was helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel but equipment a bit old”
Reviews.Author: euromarco
Reviews.Content: I have no important complaint about this hotel but we had problem with air condition which has to be fully changed during our stay ( noisy and running continuouslyt). Highway is close to the hotel and noise come from outside during the night. Bathroom needs some works Breakfast was good and there is a shuttle to parks Rooms prices on internet are correct

Reviews.Title: “Great price and location”
Reviews.Author: DizFanatic
Reviews.Content: I stayed 2 nights for business and enjoyed my stay. The room and facility was clean and well maintained. The free breakfast was awesome (especially the Mickey waffles) and the price could not be beat. I would stay again if I am in the area on business.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff and Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: belle037
Reviews.Content: Great Staff, clean rooms and good hot breakfast. Great job, we,ll be back for sure. thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay”
Reviews.Author: evilugano
Reviews.Content: The service was 5 star quality! I traveled with my family and we had a great time. A great staff ready to serve for breakfast. There were always clean.The concierge staff was extremely helpful for Internet access problem. Nice room whit flat screen TV, I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Orlando area especially if going to Disney World It is just 1 mile from the parks!

Reviews.Title: “By far the best of 4 Florida hotels stayed at in the last year”
Reviews.Author: troutmantimj
Reviews.Content: My family and I enjoyed this hotel very much. We have been to Disney 4 times in the last year and stayed at 4 different hotels. This was by far the very best! The room was exactly as pictured on the website, simple but elegant and the beds were extremely comfortable. The service was great all around from the persons at the front desk, to the ones keeping our rooms clean and stocked with fresh towels, paper and soap daily--the house keepers were exceptional. And let's not forget the crew running the breakfast buffet. The complimentary food and those keeping the buffet stocked were exceptional as well. All of the food was fresh and yummy and there was always plenty to go around. Fresh coffee was available 24/7. All of the people we came in contact with who work at this hotel were very accomodating. We'll be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great choice near Disney”
Reviews.Author: Njtravelers_11
Reviews.Content: We travel to Orlando several times per year and this hotel really met our needs. Close to Disney and other attractions, full breakfast and great service from all hotel staff we encountered. Pool a bit small but not a priority for us. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it !”
Reviews.Author: candacech
Reviews.Content: The experience was great from start to finish. Check in was quick friendly and efficient. The rooms were spacious, including a refrig and microwave. The beds were queen size and very comfy and the pillows were medium and comfy also. The duvet quilts on the beds were just right. Our wake up calls were on time. The breakfasts were great ! Scrambled eggs and sausage,cereals, breads, muffins, etc, fruit, juice, and make your own mickey mouse waffles !. Coffee and tea available 24 hours a day. There was an exercise room and pool, but we were too busy to use these. The neighborhood was a quiet street with several hotels. We did have a rental car, which helped. The shuttle went to Epcot but not Universal. The price was great - booked thru Expedia. We will stay at Hampton Inns again !

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, exactly what I would expect for a Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: drrosenthal
Reviews.Content: This hotel was perfect for our family and the 4 days we spent in Disney World. We did not use the provided shuttle as I did not feel the times worked for us. The breakfast was very plentiful and the kids really liked the Mickey Mouse waffles (so did I). The rooms was very clean as was the rest of the hotel. The fitness room had plenty of equipment which we used and the pool was perfect and there were plenty of towels provided for use in both area's. In the past we had stayed on the Disney property and I glad we chose to stay here. It took about 15 minutes to drive to any of the parks.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic, Brilliant Family Hotel, will be back!!!”
Reviews.Author: smitsh
Reviews.Content: Fantastic for the family. My husband and I, and two boys (4yo & 6yo) stayed for 6 nights. It was a quick 5 minute drive from Downtown Disney, where you can then catch the buses to all the resorts/theme parks. The location of the hotel was a stone throw from everything, restaurants at night, outlet shopping mall etc, just a few minutes drive and we were there. (the hotel had a theme park shuttle but as we had a car we didnt need to use it) The hotel itself exceeded my expecations, as a frequent Hilton business traveller i knew being part of the hilton chain it should be good, but i also knew this was more 'budget' than the Hilton. I was so impressed, the room was a good size, comfortable, clean and modern, nothing to fault here. The buffet breakfast was included and included everything you could think of, even a Mickey Mouse shaped waffle cooker to make your own. The staff were wonderful, they did everything they could to make our stay great. It must be a good place to work as the staff, cleaners, handman, everyone, were all in good spirits throughout out stay, the place was immuculant, when people are happy at work they do a good job, and the customers know about it. I would highly recommend to anyone wanting a great family hotel near DisneyWorld, i will be recommending to lots of friends in Australia!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location for Disney.”
Reviews.Author: royedthom
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Hampton Palm Parkway on numerous occasions and find it an excellent hotel with great staff and in a superb convenient location. It was very busy this time (shows how popular it is) so breakfast was crowded but free breakfast is always welcome at the Hamptons. So close to Seaworld, Downtown Disney and the parks all in all a great place.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel was great and we will be back”
Reviews.Author: Ams2000
Reviews.Content: Everything in the hotel was great . It is very clean, breakfast was great with different kinds of food and the food smell is good and fresh, staff was nice.Thr room is simple . Only need to add more shuttles to the park in the morning first one is very early and the seconed is very late.

Reviews.Title: “It is as good as the reviews.”
Reviews.Author: Huskies1
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this hotel for families going to the Disney area. The staff is great and the hotel is clean and well run. The only drawback is the traffic going into Disney but that is not the hotel's fault.

Reviews.Title: “It's great hotel”
Reviews.Author: mta98
Reviews.Content: It's great hotel, good location, rooms are clean, hotel is clean

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean but don't worry about the free breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: schneidsgame
Reviews.Content: Don't depend on the free breakfast because it is limited and not very good. The next day I realized that I had bugbites on my legs and arms. I guess this could happen at any hotel but not very good. Other than that, the place was clean and very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Cosmetic work needed but great service and free breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: Nevarena
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista with our two sons (ages 8 and 4) from July 8-10 for a short trip to Disney. I was looking for an inexpensive hotel because I knew that most of our days would be spent at the parks. Check-in was adequate..their computers were down but the staff did what they could to expedite the process. The elevators were missing chunks of wood in the flooring but the lobby and eating area was adequate. The rooms were small but the beds were comfortable. The furniture in the room and bathroom was in need of repair and honestly, complete renovation. The bedding was stained. The free WiFi was wonderful and the complimentary daily breakfast was supreme. They also offer hot tea and coffee at any hour in the lobby. Parking is free. I am not sure that I will return as the location is close to Disney but the traffic is horrible and the hotel is inexpensive but you get what you pay for....It just depends on what you are willing to sacrifice for a lower price.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mustang436
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean and the hot breakfast was great. Hot breakfast consisted of french toast, scrambled eggs, omelets and bacon. Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “good place to stay, lousy pillows”
Reviews.Author: stillsocrazy
Reviews.Content: a good nights sleep except for the pillows. they were small and square.

Reviews.Title: “The staff was incredible and we had a great time... we will be back”
Reviews.Author: TomHyland
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed the hotel very much. I will say that one of the staff members Kaylee made the trip even more of a pleasure. She helped us find the hotel and various local things we neede including a clinic and pharmacy. Thebreakfast was good and the hotel was convenient for our trip. Thanks for a great stay!

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel for minimum price!”
Reviews.Author: EyeCandy00
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before making our trip in June. All I can say about this hotel is EXCELLENT!! We stayed there for four days and then went to the horrible HOWARD JOHNSON in Miami! If we would have known how great this hotel was, I would have booked our entire 8 day trip there because the price was the same, but the service and quality was overexceeded. Breakfast was served promptly and there was a great selection every morning for every type of palette. Fresh fruit, different cereals, oatmeal, waffles made on the spot, omelets, scrambled eggs, sausages and fresh coffee - all of which were refilled or replaced before it was even empty! The surrounding were spotless, security was great (you need your keycard to access the pool area, the back door, side door, which I loved because I felt very safe. The staff was beyond pleasant and very helpful. We were 45 minutes late with checking out (just had to take a dip in the pool before we left!) and all we got was "no problem, take your time!) We love love love it and can't wait to stay here again. I'd recommend to anyone, couple or family!!

Reviews.Title: “awesome”
Reviews.Author: Jeordi
Reviews.Content: I stayed here in May on a school trip and was so impressed, I booked a private stay the next month. It is a clean and impressive hotel with a great staff and perfect for a off property trip to Disney and if you know a few secrets, you can get great access to all Disney properties. I have been to Disney 23 times and this will be my new place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Picky_traveling
Reviews.Content: Check in was super easy, Kaylee was very friendly. The rooms were big and clean and the beds were very comfortable. Very quiet. Great hotel...great value!

Reviews.Title: “Close to Disney World and Sea World”
Reviews.Author: cpour
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay. The hotel was clean and offerred an in room fridge and microwave. It's also very close to Disney World, Sea World, outlet shopping and lots of restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Tinadasgupta
Reviews.Content: We had a great time at Hampton Inn. The rooms were very spacious and well maintained. Bathroms are good. Very clean and well kept property. Boys had a great time at the pool. Breakfast is nice and wholesome. Above all the staff is very friendly. We will recomend this property to all our family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Price”
Reviews.Author: Macracker3
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed for one night and we loved it. It was right down the road from all of the Disney theme parks and the price could not be beat. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We plan on staying there in the near future with our children.

Reviews.Title: “SUPER”
Reviews.Author: Diedra61
Reviews.Content: The staff at this Hampton is SUPER from D.D. at check-in, Jonas finding boxes for our trade show display and Michael fine-tuning my in-room radio. The crew at breakfast is friendly and keeps the food hot and ready. The robust coffee is the best. My co-worker forgot her purse in the room and the staff met us as the hotel door with it so we didn't miss our flight. If you have small children, they'll love the waffles in the shape of Mickey Mouse's head. Whenever we have a show in Orlando, we stay at this hotel...you should too. Diedra

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel - second time we stayed there.”
Reviews.Author: grengar
Reviews.Content: Clean rooms, good breakfast...Close to Disney World, Sea World, and Downtown Disney. Lots of good restaurants around.

Reviews.Title: “Pearson and Bagood Family Reunion June 2011”
Reviews.Author: 4intampa
Reviews.Content: My family and I really enjoyed our stay at the Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista (6 rooms total). The staff are friendly, the location is within 10 miles of all the theme parks, breakfast is fabulous and our rooms were very comfortable. Whenever, we returned to our room...the beds were made and fresh towels were in place. The staff were very knowledgeable regarding directions and offer suggestions on the most popular things to see and do. When my family and I travel to Orlando we make it a point to stay at Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista. It's safe for families with little children as well as our seniors.

Reviews.Title: “Everything good.....but one thing”
Reviews.Author: 1Ciera
Reviews.Content: Good price, clean room, comfortable beds, free internet, complimentary hot breakfast, friendly staff at hotel check-in desk (especially Dee Dee - she needs a raise), in a quiet, nice area and close to restaurants and theme parks. The only thing not good......DO NOT have Hampton Inn book your Discovery Cove reservations. Their "Travel Desk" is open 7:00-noon however, the woman working that desk came walking in slowly at 7:30 while we and other people were sitting waiting for her to get there at 7:00. She offered no apology for being 30 minutes late. I called 2 times (including morning of our check-in date) to ask if they would have our tickets at the hotel check-in counter as we wouldn't be getting there until about 2:00 and their Travel Desk would be closed. I was assured they would have our tickets for us when we checked in. We wanted them so we could go to Sea World that afternoon with our unlimited tickets. To make a long story short..................our tickets were not there. We were told we would have to wait until the next morning when the travel desk opened to get the tickets. Next year we will order our tickets through Discovery Cove as they were the most organized place I've ever dealt with.

Reviews.Title: “Good service, price, free breakfast & close to the attraction!”
Reviews.Author: amymilwaukee
Reviews.Content: My finance and I were very pleased with this hotel. Everything seemed well cared for and maintained. We asked if we could book an extra night and it was not a problem at all. Although the front desk clerk had to monitor the availability and add it if another reservation was a no show. He did without us following up. The breakfast is very good, plenty of options. I donâ€™t even know where to begin, biscuits, gravy, pancakes, eggs, doughnuts, hash browns, cereal, yogurt, fruit salad, oranges, bananas, toast, bagels, teas, coffee, juicesâ€¦

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Staff and Cleanliness”
Reviews.Author: kat124367
Reviews.Content: I take a number of overnight trips throughout the year, and stay at different hotel chains. Hampton Inn was exceptional. The staff was very accommodating and extremely friendly. The entire hotel, from the lobby area to the room was spotless. There was nothing out of place or needing attention. This stay exceeded my expectations. I will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel we will go back”
Reviews.Author: uniform148
Reviews.Content: Hampton Inn is the only hotel I will stay at. I will definitely stay at this hotel again the next time i am in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “The staff were great and friendly.”
Reviews.Author: thewinslows
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our time at the hotel and the staff were really nice. The breakfast was great.

Reviews.Title: “Ask for a room change if you get a musty-smelling room!”
Reviews.Author: greeny-7
Reviews.Content: We stayed for one night in late May 2011, and it was an overall good experience, except that our first room smelled a bit moldy-musty. When we complained, they immediately switched us to a different room, which smelled much better. It might be because it just better-deoderized, but it worked fine for us. Service was good; they called us later to check on the smell of the 2nd room and make sure it was acceptable. This Hampton Inn is slightly worn in comparison to others (such as their Apopka, FL location which is superb). But service is good, and the location is excellent for Discovery Cove or Sea-world, as well as nearby dining (Sweet Tomatoes was great). The hot waffles and other breakfast items were nice in the morning, as was the typical benefits (free parking and wi-fi). They have no in-hotel coin-laundry though. But they told us we could use the coin-op laundry at the hotel next door, which we did, and it was fine. We didn't use the hotel pool. We'd probably stay here again if visiting Discovery Cove, though I might try to find a newer and fresher hotel along the same road. We did enjoy this location off the main strip with easy light traffic access to the park.

Reviews.Title: “Just Bad timing!!”
Reviews.Author: NYC613
Reviews.Content: We were just staying in Orlando for 2 nights, and after seeing the reviews I thought this hotel would be a good fit. It is centrally located to all the theme parks. 15 minutes to Universal and 10 minutes to Epcot. My wife and I found it very clean and comfortable. It had a nice pool and small gym. The next morning the free breakfast was wonderful and more than we expected. That same morning I got a call from the front desk to inform us that they were working on a transformer near the hotel and we would be losing power until about 5 PM. I figured that was ok since we were going to Epcot and would out most of the day. Well you guessed it when we got back about 7 PM the hotel was completely dark. We found just one man and one woman behind the desk trying to help all the guest. when we finally got to the front of the line they offered to arrange to get us a room at anoter hotel up the road for no additional cost. We took the offer. Unfortunately the hotel had no back up generator or for that matter any emergency equipment in place to deal with this disaster. We had to walk up 3 flights of stairs in the dark and then move out of our room using only the light from our cell phones. They had no flashlights available for guests. They were completely unprepared in fact the clerks were using thier own personal cell phones to arrange the accomodations for us...they were completely overwhelmed...you couldn't help but feel sorry for them. The hotel they sent us was ok but they didn't provide a free breakfast. I don't know if it was just bad timing, but I was terribly disappointed at how unprepared they were for something like the lights going out.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay that is clean and great value!”
Reviews.Author: IARamirez28
Reviews.Content: The hotel has a full breakfast included for the whole family, the beds are comfortable and most important, the rooms are clean. The staff is very friendly. The gym is well equipped but some of the free weights were missing. Overall it is well recommended if you want to go to the Disney parks. Very close to everything that you need.

Reviews.Title: “Not Bad”
Reviews.Author: KimKim69
Reviews.Content: The hotel is old & small but clean. There is no restaurant around this hotel .It is 20 min walk to go there. (when you get back from Disney and tired it is too hard to walk 20 min more ). The shopping mall looks close but it is not . you should take a Taxi or wait for free shuttle ( 1 pick up very day ). The Free shuttle to Disney is only 2 pick up every day ( 8 15 am & 12 45 Pm ). The Breakfast is just ok . The front desk people are awesome and helpful . Overall we werenâ€™t happy with this hotel . Thank God the power out (Hotel problem) , they Transfer us to Hilton Garden Inn Orlando Lake Buena Vista .This hotel is awesome , new , clean and almost luxury and it is almost same price with Hampton inn and same location . But the hotel has Restaurant and bar with tasty food and very good price . They have room service as well with great swimming area . I really like Hilton garden Inn and highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: a_perez86
Reviews.Content: After ALOT of research, I decided to trust the reviews on Trip Advisor and book a room at the Hampton Inn Orlando/ Lake Buena Vista. It was a GREAT decision!!! The reviews hold true... Clean comfortable rooms, great breakfast, pleasant staff and you can't beat the location. Best of all, the price was right! Will definatley stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Best value for your money!”
Reviews.Author: Time4Fun21
Reviews.Content: Complimentary breakfast is great. The Mickey Mouse waffle maker is unique to this hotel and makes you feel like you're at a Disney resort. Breakfast closes at 10am so you can sleep in a little and still find plenty of food when you show up. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Staff is very friendly and helpful. We will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “If you want to Know what a Nursing Home is Like....”
Reviews.Author: FayveelSRQ
Reviews.Content: We had high expectations based on the trip advisor reviews. Boy, were they wrong....The place is sorely outdated. We chose a King Room and opened the door into a Nursing Room Suite complete with a shower chair in the bath, a ramp up in to the shower so that the water that ran all over the bathroom, handicapped facilities throughout including a lowered desk and hanger bar in the closet, wheelchair rub marks all over the place. The room was dark and dingy. When we asked for a refund based on their 100% satisfaction guarantee that was refused as we were told that ALL the Kings are set up this way!! BE ADVISED!! DO NOT PICK A KING ROOM IN THIS HOTEL!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice location with city bus access (Lynx)”
Reviews.Author: jjphilip
Reviews.Content: This location is great. it is15 miles from the airport (MCO). If you get a taxi you will pay approximately 60$. If you are like me and want to save money, there is a city shuttle that you can take from the airport (Lynx bus 111). You can catch the shuttle from Zone A of the airport (Level 1). You will then get off at Downtown disney westside transfer center and catch the Lynx bus 50 ( which goes thru palm parkway) and you can get right in front of the hotel. I only paid 4$ for the ride from the airport. The ride from the airport to this hotel will take about 1 Hr 20 Min but its worth the money saved. You can get more bus info on the Lynx website. This location is very close to lot of different restaurants/fast foods. If you like to walk it is about 10 Minute from this location. You can buy all sorts of tickets to different attractions right in the hotel. That is very convenient. This way you can avoid long lines at the parks to buy the tickets. There is a complementary shuttle the hotel provides to walt disney world ( Drops you off at Epcot). You can take the monorail to travel to other parks form there. The complementary shuttle departs at 8:15AM & 12 PM and the earliest the shuttle will pick you up from the park back to the hotel is at 5:50PM) If you want to go to universal studios there is a fee of 10$ per person. If you decide you want to come back early from walt disney and not wait for the complementary shuttle, you can catch a lynx shuttle (Bus 50) from the disney ticket center and get right in front of the hotel (Will take about 40 Min for the ride). The rooms are in good condition. Its is clean. Room has a standard TV (not a flat screen), a small refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker. Clean bathroom. You can get coffee and drinks (juice) any time from the breakfast area. This location has Wi fi. Breakfast if excellent. Lot of things to chose from. (Sausage, eggs, muffins, donuts, cereals, etc).

Reviews.Title: “Great affordable place to stay near Disney”
Reviews.Author: ptois0again
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel for 3 spring breaks in a row, and have been pleased with our experience overall. The hotel is very close to the Disney parks. It is clean and the staff is helpful and polite. The outdoor pool is small but pleasant. The fitness center has free weights and cardio equipment. The queen sized beds are comfortable. The continental breakfast is good, but busy. They could use an extra mickey waffle maker, and an extra 30 minutes to eat considering the number of people at breakfast. This year I felt the quality slip ever so slightly. The hotel shows a little more wear and was not as clean as years past (although still acceptable). The hotel seems to be popular with school/ athletic groups and was full of unsupervised preteens and teens. Of course the hotel management can't really force supervision. It seems to be a great place if you are taking a group of kids to Disney. Maybe not the best choice if you want peace and quiet.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel in all areas”
Reviews.Author: babsneo
Reviews.Content: Stayed here recently 15th-22nd April with my family and had a very pleasant stay. The rooms are clean, towels were fine and as expected changed daily. The swimming pool was lovely at the end of the day and although the amount of sunbeds did not seem plentiful we always managed to get one. The breakfast area was always busy in the mornings but to be expected. They could do with a bin outside the hotel- minor quibble. If I was really being picky I would fault the condition of the complimentary bus to Disney- it really had seen better days, you had to make up your own seats, but as it was free perhaps I shouldnt complain too much. Did stay at Hampton Inn S Universal Studios the previous week and if I'm totaaly honest did prefer this one, but couldnt really find any major faults considering the price paid

Reviews.Title: “Hotel rooms are a little old, but service is good”
Reviews.Author: dcsac1
Reviews.Content: It's time for a update, but breakfast was good, and service was also good. Fairly close to disney, and universal. I would stay again

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel with everything you need!”
Reviews.Author: SJC_Monkton
Reviews.Content: Wonderful hotel from start to finish. Great value and welcome at the start, with easy parking every night. The room was very clean, spacious and the bathroom was clean and well equiped. TV, fridge, Air Con and WiFi were all very useful at times. The breakfast in the morning was simply the very best - including their famous Mickey Mouse waffles! The gym was well equiped and, whilst we never made it to the pool, it looked inviting. The location is outstanding for all the Disney and Universal parks and easy to travel to get evening meals when we needed. Overall, this hotel was exceptional in it's welcome, service and value and we will certainly be recommending it to anyone who is heading to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and value for the confort”
Reviews.Author: Excellent_choice
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel, nice rooms, nice staff and good breakfast. Easy access and very good location. I would return next time in Orlando !!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place, I would stay again!”
Reviews.Author: will37862
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel for its location, nice and close to Disney without the Disney resort prices. And we were not disappointed. The room was very comfortable and clean. The bedding was a little odd, the blankets are kinda lumpy but no big deal. The room was quiet and air conditioning unit worked well. The free breakfast was about what you expect. It was cute that they had a make your own waffle station and one made mickey mouse shaped waffles :) The only issue we had was at check out. They had quoted me one price for all 3 nights but when the bill came it had a different higher rate for 2 of the nights. I showed them my confirmation info and they corrected it. They were nice about it but seemed to think somehow I had caused the issue, not sure about that. But that was a minor hiccup and we overall enjoyed our stay and would go back again anytime. BUT PLEASE CHECK YOUR BILL CLOSELY. Just in case.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay! Would definetly stay again.”
Reviews.Author: Bon33
Reviews.Content: Good location. Friendly staff. Free breakfast and free coffee and tea all day and night was a plus.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: FlaHurricane
Reviews.Content: This was a VERY reasonable hotel and I totally understand why. It was worth the money but not a penny more. I truly now understand the term "You get what you pay for" I kept my slippers on 100% of the time I was in this room because the carpet was uhhhhh....... "well broken in" to be polite. The bathroom wasn't even as clean as some of the public restrooms in the theme parks and fast food restaurants in the area and the icing on the cake was the left over food in the refrigerator from a guest LONG GONE bye. It wasn't from a day or two ago it was from a MONTH or TWO ago. If they don't open the refrigerator between guests or between a dozen or so guests how often do they change the sheets, quilts, towels or clean?

Reviews.Title: “Location-Location-Location”
Reviews.Author: sstairs
Reviews.Content: This property is centrally located to many central Florida attractions. The property is located close to several fine family restaurants. The property is very clean and generally well maintained and in my opinion is a very good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “it was a beautiful hotel and great accomodations..”
Reviews.Author: villagranwpb
Reviews.Content: ur staff was very friendly.. the staff member that stood out was ur night auditor, she went above and beyond to make sure our group was experience the best stay available... on another note the young lady that worked the evening of 3/26 was not friendly... while relaxing in lobby area wit our group celebrating our victories, she was trying to ask us to leave and not happy about our gathering.. then ur night auditor came in and saved the night for us..

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly staff! Overall, a great experience.”
Reviews.Author: yellolabSavannah
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights at the Hampton Inn while visiting Disney. The staff was very friendly, polite, and helpful! There was a wide variety of food for breakfast each morning. Great location for Disney. Thanks for the military discount, too! We will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Place to stay for Disney”
Reviews.Author: klind67
Reviews.Content: Nice room. Easy access to Disney. Breakfast included. Free Internet.

Reviews.Title: “Real Comfartable on You and Your Wallet”
Reviews.Author: jackiseson1
Reviews.Content: What a great deal for the family. We spent time in a different hotel that was more than double the price and everything was al carte.Water was 4 bucks, candy bar was 2, everything was a pricey privledge. Even to park was nearly 11bucks a day.. If I could walk to the hotel why would I need a hotel? Then we arrive at your hotel. 3 kinds of coffee waiting for you, a big smile at the desk, easy check in. We especially ejoyed the breakfast it was better than being home because I didn't have to do the dishes. t was nice because it made our day so much easier and everyone got a great hot breakfast. The Staff was super friendly and went out of there way and held our bags in the office for the day so they didn't have to sit in our car all day. Kudos do your staff and the next time we travel we will seek out your hotels from now on. Thanks for making our stay a great one.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant stay!”
Reviews.Author: hikinggal
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel based on TripAdvisor reviews and were not disappointed. The rooms were spotlessly clean and staff was very helpful and courteous. The hotel is about 2 miles from Downtown Disney-very convenient. It is located on a palm/tree lined street that felt safe to us. We ventured out for walks along the street and felt safe here. The breakfast was OK. We felt the eggs left a little to be desired but there was fresh fruit, baked goods, cereal, waffles etc that were very good. If you have laundry to do, the laundry facilities at the hotel next door are available which is nice rather than having to find a laundromat. If you want a yummy dinner, we found the Black Angus steakhouse on the corner of Palm Parkway and Apopka-Vineland Rd to be very good! Right next to the Olive Garden and a nice walk from the hotel. We would definitely stay here again. It is a nice hotel with some added amenities that served our purpose quite well

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel close to Disney”
Reviews.Author: Fernando84
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a very nice location, close to Disney and to the Orlando Premium Outlet- Vineland Avenue. A shuttle is provided to the Disney Parks (for free) and to Universal Studios and Island of Adventure (10 dollars for the return trip). The rooms are spacious and cozy. Further, the staff is extremely friendly!! My only complaint concerns the towels available in the rooms. Although clean they look extremely old and should have already been replaced.

Reviews.Title: “Nice little hotel, but it is time to replace those towels!”
Reviews.Author: twinstars616
Reviews.Content: Hotel is nice, rooms are spacious. Staff is friendly. Location is close to downtown Disney. Complimentary breakfast is decent. Weekdays they have breakfast on the run packages, which was a nice touch. Biggest complaint would be the towels, they are EXTREMELY old and limp. Closer to rags that I would use to clean up around the house. It is definitely time to replace those towels!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice! Clean, comfortable, great breakfast and location”
Reviews.Author: 6spikes
Reviews.Content: Very accommodating and you could buy disney and universal tickets at the hotel. Reserve your room early and get a great price when you pay ahead of time.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and a great breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: Kristen07724
Reviews.Content: Perfect hotel for a short trip to Disney. My son loved the pool, the rooms were comfortable and clean, and it was great to have an ample continental breakfast before a long day at the theme park.

Reviews.Title: “First time off Disney property- Pleasantly surprised!- Coming back.”
Reviews.Author: pckytrvlr
Reviews.Content: Went to watch daughter play softball in Kissimmee. Decided to stay off WDW property for the first time ever. I am a very picky when it comes to hotel rooms and would rather pay more for cleanliness, safety and service. This hotel was a wonderful surprise. It is close to restaraunts, WDW, shopping, sporting venues. It is located about 3 blocks from downtown disney on a beautiful palm tree lined street. The whole property was very clean and kept. Lotsa parking and very nice swim pool with hot tub. The breakfast was very nice. The staff seemed to work very hard to keep everything fresh. The room was spacious with a comfortable bed. The part I loved was the room was insulated very well. While in the hallway I realized there were families with small children all around us. Never heard a sound in our room for the entire week we were there. The price was absolutely great!! I would stay here from now on. A great hotel for 1/2 the price of a WDW room, with free breakfast and free parking. The traffic was congested at times as you enter the WDW property but that is to be expected. Would definately come to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: TheresaSlaughter
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay. It was very convenient to Disney World. Just a quick hop out to Interstate 4 and you were at the Disney properties. It was clean and well kept and the staff were very friendly. They even have a Mickey Mouse waffle maker for breakfast. We have stayed there two times and both times were very good. I would totally recommend this location.

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful Experience for leisure or Business”
Reviews.Author: Brashear
Reviews.Content: I traveled with my husband while he attended a business conference. This hotel is immaculate with wonderful service. The breakfast was hot and yummy. The beds were comfortable and the rooms were immaculate. I would recommend this hotel for business or leisure.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: bauman147
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this particular location twice. It is close to airport and it is walking distance to several local restaurants (I believe a few of them are Chilis, Sonny's BBQ, Denny's and Tony Roma's). The staff is always very friendly and accommodating, and Hampton's always have an elaborate continental breakfast. Another bonus is that although one side of the hotel faces on a busy boulevard, there is plenty of sidewalk for walking though very attractively landscaped areas surrounding office buildings that don't have a lot of traffic.

Reviews.Title: “Worth every penny, staff professional, courteous, and helpful!”
Reviews.Author: familyof4FL_11
Reviews.Content: My family and I spent 3 nights at this hotel and had a great experience overall. Our room was right off the elevator, which made me cringe at first, but was surprisingly quiet. We didn't have any issues with noise whatsoever. Unfortunately, the second night we were there, our daughter had an accident in the bed (which had waterproof mattress covers). The hotel staff was incredibly accommodating in getting us extra towels, sheets, and other things we needed. Breakfast was enjoyable, albeit a little busy with all of the Disney World visitors... In-room coffee was actually tasty, and the room-fridge actually worked (we've had a problem in other hotels with that). Altogether, a great stay and a nice place to come back to after the craziness of the Disney experience.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Mary530501
Reviews.Content: We spent 8 night at this Hampton, and it was great. Hotel and rooms were very clean. Front desk was friendly and accommodating. Breakfast was always plentiful and good. Free internet and printing came in handy. Very convenient to parks and restaurants. We would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: SandraJT
Reviews.Content: This is just one great place to stay. We were here for five nights in February, 2011. The staff is friendly and helpful. They always had a smile and a greeting when we returned. We especially liked the computer area. You used your room key to gain access. It was great to check email, do a Mapquest, and check out some websites. The breakfast was included in the price, and it was quite a spread. I liked the waffles shaped like Mickey Mouse's head. There was fresh fruit, pastries, eggs and sausages, cereals, etc. They even had the flavored creamers for your morning coffee. The hotel is about one and a half , to two miles from Downtown Disney. There were several restaurants, Denny's, House of Kobe, Sweet Tomatoes, Olive Garden, within a fifteen to twenty minute walk. We weren't in the room that much, but the beds and bed linens were so wonderful. Our room had a fridge and microwave, which was much appreciated. There was no guest laundry, but they have an agreement with Extended Stay Hotel next door for Hampton Inn guests to use their laundry room. There is nice landscaping around the pool and hot tub area. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly priced hotel in great location...”
Reviews.Author: fashionista1082
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I arenâ€™t the types to stay inside a hotel for very long; however, we were presently surprised by this hotel. The price, how clean it was, the free breakfast, and especially its location, where all great. Driving distance to the parks, Disney golf courses, and Down Town Disney, were extremely short and easy to get to-which is why I booked our stay here in the first place. We look forward to staying there again for our future trips. OH! AND FREE PARKING, in room internet connection/wi-fi, and free business center all plusses! Hampton Inn, keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel. Very clean and comfortable. Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: TImetraveler20
Reviews.Content: This was a definite trip advisor " find". The hotel is new and very well maintained. Friends staying at a nearby resort felt the Hampton Inn is a nicer room. I helped my Aunt find this hotel & we were all impressed ! The staff was very helpful and professional. Breakfast area is very nice, clean, and good Would definitely come again. Great location. Drive to Disney is about 10 minutes. Thank you trip advisor travelers for honest comments & feedback.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: ewtquilts
Reviews.Content: Chris was awsome , Karen was very helpful too. on the front desk staff. The room was very clean, the breakfast had many choices. The staff as a whole was friendly and helpful. I would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great service. Always a smiley face!”
Reviews.Author: Rawbear
Reviews.Content: Excellent service for the business traveler. Also a lot of family activity. Breakfast is good but it is a very busy (noisy?) period. The staff is key here. They are extremely nice and seem to be autonomous in their decision, able to solve problems as they arise. Our team was very pleased by this choice of accommodation.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: mhdg23
Reviews.Content: Excellent in all regards-comfort, cleanliness, service. Breakfast, internet, and tea/coffee available at all times were all features of this hotel that make it better than other area hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Meagatron954
Reviews.Content: Was a very nice hotel located off a main road. Was easy to get to Disney parks & downtown nightlife. Staff was intelligent and helpful. Room was clean and nice. Paid $80 for one night. A bit much, but worth it. Free breakfast was good!

Reviews.Title: “great hotel with great service”
Reviews.Author: jasperfrankl
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hampton Inn last week and was very pleased with the service I received. For the price I payed you get a pretty good breakfast, free wi-fi, parking and a shuttle to disney. I'm not sure what the post before me stated with missing the fire works because there is a shuttle at 10 at night so I didn't miss any of the shows and saved parking! The front desk staff was great and very friendly; I will go back just because I know they will take care of me. The same red headed/blonde girl checked me in that checked me out and I nagged her the whole trip with questions and she was more than willing to go out of her way to make sure all my questions were answered and was friendly and very funny. When I got back from disney I had more questions and the guy at the desk was soo nice and was pleased to see people who know how to do their job. The only flaw is you can tell they are understaffed when it gets busy when we got back from disney in the evening and when we were checking out they were trying to converse but phones were ringing, lost foreign guests, and paperwork everywhere. It does lessen the personal experience you get when it isn't busy but that is more poor management, what happened to two people at the front desk?! One of the only hotels I have seen this at.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel (typical Hampton) - not so good shuttle service”
Reviews.Author: chicagoan5
Reviews.Content: The primary reason I stayed at this Hampton is because of the free shuttle service to and from Epcot so that I can skip the driving and paying the parking. The shuttle arrived promptly between 8:30 & 8:45AM. But Hampton was the first stop. It took about 15 minutes to pick up customers from other surrounding hotels. There were 3 choices of time for the return pick up: 12PM, 5:50PM and 7:50PM. But on that particular day the Epcot close at 9PM and that was when they had fireworks. If I have to do it again I would stay at another Hampton at a lower rate and drive my car and pay for the parking ($14) at Disney for more flexibility. The hotel itself was fine but don't stay there because of the free shuttle. It is not worth the higher hotel rate.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay but getting pricy now”
Reviews.Author: ablegator
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista early December for a week with my five year old grandson. I would highly recommend this hotel for people who want a nice comfortable/clean room close to Disney. The cleaning services were great and the breakfast that rotated food each day was even better. Mickey waffles were a big hit with the grandson. Was planning a return trip in May. However, they have almost doubled in price from December. Is it worth $100+ a night? Heck, you can stay ON Disney World property for that daily rate.

Reviews.Title: “Great shopping and food”
Reviews.Author: travaswego
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff was friendly and helpful of surrounding areas. My room was clean and relaxing. I could not escape the magic of Disney and spent most all my time away from the hotel. Diffidently consider booking her again. Thanks for the great stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent breakfast, service, and housekeeping.”
Reviews.Author: MOrtega75
Reviews.Content: We are a family of four and found "The Hampton Inn" at Lake Buena Vista, Orlando: Comfurtable, cozy, CLEAN, great customer service and the breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “good value/clean and close to attractions”
Reviews.Author: maxwell8
Reviews.Content: A nice relatively new hotel in a great location . This Hampton Inn provided a nice stay at a reasonable price. I especially liked the ample parking , free internet , and comfortable rooms. My daughter and I stayed here 3 nights to go to Universal and Harry Potter World. Another reason I pick Hampton Inns is the fact that breakfast is included. This is worth 10 to 20 dollars a person so it always influences my selection. However, I would say that the breakfast at this Hampton was marginal ... the scrambled eggs were hard little pellets ( it's not that hard to make eggs fluffy and soft) .. most of the fruit was gone quickly.... think they need a new kitchen manager The outdoor pool and hot tub was nice after walking all day on concrete at Harry Potter World.... overall this is a nice hotel that is a great value ....comfortable room and beds

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff, great room, will be back!”
Reviews.Author: artoodetoo
Reviews.Content: Great: beds, clean, towels, free wi-fi, free breakfast, free parking. Superb: staff. Air conditioner: some noise. Fridge ok, microwave old style but ok, tube tv but ok with cable tv. For the price and ammenities, the best value.

Reviews.Title: “We plan on returning”
Reviews.Author: Smile4today
Reviews.Content: Speeding check in. Very clean room! Large bathroom, plenty of hot water no complaints here! Room had 2 queen beds - the most comfortable beds ever. Whole hotel very clean. We did not hear anyone in the halls, or rooms. If you like a good 'fan' noise when you sleep, the rooms air/heat unit provides nicely - we need this 'white noise'. Breakfast room is very large and employees kept the tables clean and food trays full. Plentiful food ranging from western omelets, sausage patties, waffles, juices, fruit, cereals. The menu choices changed daily which I enjoyed. Another thing I liked was the free wifi and that there was coffee and hot water/tea available all day and night in the breakfast room. We rented a car and drove to all of our destination, but I understand they offered free shuttle services. Parking lot was large and free. No trouble find a parking spot. Walking to down town Disney from this hotel could be done, but it would be a long walk. There are great resturants and grocery stores very close. Sidewalks all around for those who would like a jog. Safe and quiet location. We will go back.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing experience, wish we had stayed all week”
Reviews.Author: DLamez
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton Inn for one night following a week stay at Disney's Pop Century. We booked the last night after a flight change; we were just looking for a cheap one night stay but got so much more. The Hampton Inn staff was amazing, we arrived very late, around 12 am, and the front desk lady greeted us with a smile and treated us like a close friend asking about our day etc. We commented that we had a lot of luggage to move, so she went and got the luggage cart for us and then asked if we'd like a room close to the front or elevator. We quickly agreed and had a room very close to the lobby which made moving in and out a breeze. The room was very clean and the beds were so comfy. In the morning, the breakfast was better than some of the character breakfasts we had in Disney World, the Mickey waffles were great as well as the coffee, eggs, bacon, etc. More than enough to start you day. There wasn't a yogurt that I liked and the lady monitoring the breakfast went back and brought me a strawberry one. When we checked out in the morning, we were once again greeted by a smiling staff member who asked about our stay quickly and asked if there were any airline tickets they could print for us or if we needed directions. We asked the quickest way to magic kingdom and were given great directions, I think we were there within 20 minutes and this was on christmas eve day. Overall, this was a fantastic stay. Our only regret was having spent more to stay on property for the rest of the week. Next time we will be staying at the Hampton for the entire week.

Reviews.Title: “Our college basketball team had a great last day in Florida thanks to our stay at Hampton Inn LBV.”
Reviews.Author: bearcats40
Reviews.Content: Our team travels all over the eastern US and we always choose Hampton Inn. We can depend on a clean, comforable room and a personal experience with the staff. We always find a way to be in the lobby for cookies and coffee at 5 :) Hampton Inn spoils me.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable - value for money!”
Reviews.Author: AussieMum073
Reviews.Content: When we travel in the US we look for something clean and comfortable at a reasonable (or better still, bargain) price. We got it here. The rooms are very clean (and I'm picky), the beds and bedding are comfortable, the rooms are spacious, parking was free and the breakfast was very good. We used the free shuttle service to get to Disney every day. On a couple of occassions we wanted to return to the hotel before the first scheduled trip home so we just used the government bus service from the Disney transport centre and the bus dropped us off in front of the hotel - easy. The only thing that was inconvienient about the hotel was that it does not have a guest laundry. It was possible to use the guest laundry in the hotel next door though. All in all I would highly recommend this hotel as a great base for your Disney/Theme Park family holiday.

Reviews.Title: “clean, friendly”
Reviews.Author: ang10scot
Reviews.Content: loved staying here, first time booking with a hotel at Orlando and would definitly stay here again, Very clean room was cleaned every day, the beds were cleaned when requested towels were changed every day too.

Reviews.Title: “The worst Hampton Inn experience, the manager was rude and unprofessional”
Reviews.Author: TravelDad168
Reviews.Content: We had a group of 5 including two children. We booked the hotel via Hilton Honors web site. The web site indicated that this was one of the few hotels that had a single room for five people for six days of stay. The price was high since we requested a room for five. When we arrived, the front desk person name Chris told us that the room could only hold four people and they did not have any movable bed to be added to our room. I showed him the print out of our reservation that stated we had five people, he said that was the problem of the Hilton Honors web site, and the hotel had nothing to do with that. I asked for my options, he contacted the hotel manager. The hotel manager told Chris that I could pay for another room for 4 days. As the hotel was sold out for the last two days of our stay, he said that he would give me a movable bed for the last two days of our stay. As I don't have any other options, I had to pay an extra $449.96 for an additional room for four nights. After checked into our rooms, we found out that the fridges on both rooms were very noisy. We had to unplug them in order to sleep. Other than that, the hotel facilities are similar to other Hampton Inns. We checked out the additional room after the fourth night and expected to see a movable bed in our other room after we come back from the park. To our surprise, when we came back near mid-night, we did not see the movable bed in our room. When my wife came to the front desk to ask about it, she was directed to the telephone to talk to the hotel manager. The manager told my wife that there is nothing the hotel can do. The only option for us was to check out of the hotel and go to somewhere else. This was at 12:30 am in the night and my two kids were already sleeping. My wife told him that if we were forced to check out at this late hour, we would have to sleep in the hotel lobby, and we might have to call the police to help us find a temporary shelter. He finally gave in and give us another room in the hotel for the night. On our last night of stay, we finally saw the movable bed that should have to be in our roon on the first night of stay. In general, I have good experiences with Hampton Inn. I hope this hotel is just an exception because of the bad management. I would definitely not recommend this particular hotel, but I have not lost hope on Hampton Inn in general.

Reviews.Title: “Great alternative to Disney Resorts-”
Reviews.Author: parkhopper1213
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Disney value resorts for many years. Tired of high priced rooms with few amenities. Hampton Inn had a great breakfast to offer its guests, and that saved us over $100 over the course of our trip. The rooms were well appointed and very clean. They included a coffee maker, microwave, iron and ironing board and refrigerator. They do not have an on-site laundry and really need to install one if they want families to stay there. In the meantime, they have an agreement with a neighboring hotel and guests can use their facilities. Chose to rent a car versus use hotel shuttle. The shuttle service only ran a few times a day and provide services to the neighborhing hotels. Staff excellent and went out of their way to please their guests.

Reviews.Title: “The stay was very comfortable, staff is very friendly.”
Reviews.Author: good4u50
Reviews.Content: This hotel is closely located to the theme parks. That was the reason for me to choose this. There is free continental breakfast available on premisis. That way, I do not have to go in search of a breakfast place in the morning, when I am in hurry to get to theme parks. Quite a few restruants / fastfood chains are close by. So, to grab something in the evening is also easy. I travelled with my family with kids. They felt the beds are really comfy and had a very good sleep. The staff is very friendly, and will do whatever they can (within their limits) to make your stay comfortable. If this hotel could offer child booster seat ( which does not cost much ) for the needed families... upon request, it would be one more additional amenity that could be offered by the hotel. Airlines charge to carry the child seat instead the hotel can offer such little things it might make a traveller to choose this facility over the others. Just a thought. If there is a better way... about it , I do not know. I would definitely recommend this facility for anyone that is looking for a nice place while visiting Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Uncomfortable Beds and outdated rooms”
Reviews.Author: bobndee67
Reviews.Content: Judging by a few more recent reviews, I'm glad I'm not alone when I saw how terribly uncomfortable the beds are in this hotel. My wife and teenage son had the same complaint. We spent a very restless wee at this hotel because of these inferior bed. Are things so bad that they can't supply better bedding? The beds reminded me of the mattresses you get in sofas or pull out cots. They are Very soft and the springs are squeaky. The rooms are fairly clean but like others mentioned very outdated and cheap looking. Not the cleanest or not the dirtiest place we've stayed at. Also agree with the person who said the sheets and towels weren't crisp and white. Otherwise, I suppose it's a fair value. You could do worse, but much better as well. If they had better beds, I'd give it another star. After this trip we decided that it wasn't worth our saving a few bucks for such discomfort.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for Disney World vacation”
Reviews.Author: baseball_fan95
Reviews.Content: The hotel was fantastic. Clean, quiet, good location & great breakfast each morning. The only issue I found was not every room had a wired internet connection and that was what we needed and unfortunately our room was not accessible.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in a great location!”
Reviews.Author: j14jordan
Reviews.Content: The Hampton offered great amenities at a very affordable price right in the middle of the DIsney area. It was very easy to get to the parks and Downtown Disney from the hotel. It was the most comfortable and effortless hotel stay I've experienced!

Reviews.Title: “OK at best but very low end and pretty dingey.”
Reviews.Author: RichardLois2
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at this hotel about 3 years ago, while they were renovating, and thought that the experience would be the same. We couldn't be more wrong. I wonder if it's under new management or ownership. Three years ago, the rooms were extremely clean, the towels very white and the bedding was very comfortable. This is no longer true. Now the room is very, very cheapo, with yellowed towels and sheets, and the mattress and pillows are very cheap and uncomfortable. The pillows used to be high-quality, a choice of "firm" "medium or soft written on them from the same manufacturer. Now they were old, worn and cheap-the same as those $5 pillows from Walmart I am STILL aching from the awful, saggy mattress. They really went cheap here as well. Not only was it uncomfortable, but it would slide away from the base mattress, even if you just sat on it. The duvet was not cleaned well and the baseboard cover was this old and cheap gold fabric. The sheets were yellowed and worn looking and not crisp. Even the TV was old and cheap, looking like something out of 1970. I know I keep mentioning how cheap everything is, because that's how to best describe it. The owners of this hotel intentionally went cheap, sacrificing quality and comfort in order to make a few more bucks out of their customers. What remains is a dingey, skeevey, uncrisp hotel, nothing as it was 3 short years ago. We were very disappointed to say the least. I really have to wonder if some of these reviews are legit. They seem to say the same thing and are nowhere near the reality of this hotel. As for breakfast, it was nothing special and the eggs stunk. Why are so many people raving about it and the flavorless Mickey pancakes? Makes me wonder if the hotel management is writing these reviews. Be very leary. If you stay here you will need a car as nothing is really walking distance. I cannot recommend this hotel to anyone. It's uncomfortable, the room decor is cheap and lacks crispness. For over $100 you can do better.

Reviews.Title: “We have already stayed 6 times in this hotel in 2010...”
Reviews.Author: SGSFamily
Reviews.Content: ... And we have 2 additional stays scheduled in 2011, until expiration of our Disney Florida resident seasonal passes. We are a family of 3, including a 5 year-old. After trying 3 Orlando "big name" resorts, we decided to select Hampton Inn as our Orlando "home away from home" for our Disney trips. The staff is always willing to make your stay the most enjoyable and provide an excellent service, whether in taking care of your room or offering a wonderful comlimentary breakfast buffet, including Mickey-shaped waffles. We enjoyed the bedding at the Hampton Inn so much that we purchased the Hampton Inn goose-down queen set from an online hotel supplier! We noticed a significant difference in our sleep quality, which we wanted to carry over in our South Florida home. We highly recommend the Hampton Inn LBV, for people with a moderate budget, who want to stay close enough to the Disney parks, but cannot afford WDW resorts. This hotel is definitely worth repeated visits!

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: hsqos
Reviews.Content: Based on tripadvisor reviews I booked this hotel to stay after spending time in a Disney Hotel and before going to the Gulf Coast. Got a great price through Octopus Travel. We arrived early and the staff more than happy to let us check in. Rooms very clean and quite big. Breakfast was included and good choice which included Mickey Waffles. Would be more than happy to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value and fair service”
Reviews.Author: bncav
Reviews.Content: We have chosen the Hampton Inn/Lake Buena Vista for two reasons: first, we are members of Hilton Honors what is good for miles and complimentary services; second, based on Trip Advisor reviews. I can say that this stay has paid itself for both reasons and the hotel has really attended all of our expectations. The best is about location (although no place in Orlando can be "close to every attraction"), where we could drive easily to anywhere we wanted to go and we could find any kind of convenience (Walgreens, restaurants and shopping). Other feature can be price, since we have got a USD70 daily rate, with complimentary breakfast, wi-fi internet and parking, what is VERY good. The downsides are the breakfast room, which is very small for the hotel size (it is CROWDED after 08:30am) and the shuttle service to Walt Disney World, which is independently managed, but in a VERY old bus and no so convenient schedule. In a second visit, I would probably choose this hotel, but I'd rather pay the USD 14 for parking in the Walt Disney parks, given convenience and comfort.

Reviews.Title: “A MEMORABLE WEEK”
Reviews.Author: jitenm
Reviews.Content: I am from Mumbai , India. I was in US for about three weeks I spent 7 days in orlado at hampton inn. The LOcation of the hotel is just perfect to visit all the major attractions in Orlando. With Shuttle service to Epcot you are connected to all the Disney Theme Parks in the most economical way. We enjoyed the stay of whole week at this hotel. The room was clean. IMy daughter is a vegeterian. SHe was able to have a good teasty breakfast during the stay. The Breakfast is with Hot N Cold options & has something for every taste. I enjoyed the different flavoured tea every day. The staff is very co-operative & helpful. THe travel desk operating from 7.30 to 12.30 in the morning helps you to get the entry tickets before you reach the theme parks. Interenet connectivity is complimentary allows you to stay connected with your interests. At the price it is absolute value for money

Reviews.Title: “Great experience for the price - will stay again”
Reviews.Author: translator450
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a night and very much enjoyed it. The hotel is perfectly located just blocks from I-4 and one exit away from Disney. It is nice and clean, and the rooms are great - brand new bathrooms, very comfortable beds with a wonderful comforter and lots of fluffy pillows, fridge, and microwave. The breakfast is pretty darn good considering it's free - scrambled eggs, sausage, waffles, fruit, etc. And the 24-hour coffee station is great. I will definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Has to be one of the best bargain-priced hotels next to the Disney World parks”
Reviews.Author: Desertfan1
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hampton Inn on Palm Parkway for five nights. The experience was very good, indeed. Our room was spacious, modern, clean and quiet. The bathroom was spotless and the fixtures all in very good condition. The hotel staff was very accommodating and allowed us to keep one room despite extending our stay day by day and was very helpful whenever we asked for assistance with anything. While the hotel is a little ways away from Disney World, it's only about 10 minutes by car to the door of Epcot. And, due to the distance away, it's really that much more peaceful when you want to get away from the theme park scene. The room has no in-room safe, but they do offer small safe deposit boxes at the front desk without extra charge. Overall, highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Centrally located, friendly staff and good break-fast”
Reviews.Author: MaheshTravelTips
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located at the center of Palm Parkway in Lake Buena Vista. The staff is very friendly and gave me good tips about do's and dont's at Disney Parks. They have good standard break-fast. The rooms were clean and big. There is also a food court where you get Indian food, Dominos/ Cici Pizza about two blocks (read a mile) away. The hotel is very close to Seaworld and Aquatica. Universal studios is about $30 away each side. The hotel has once a day drop off to Epcot from where you could take the Monorail to Magic Kingdom or bus to other Disney parks. It picks you up in three different timings. This bus also goes to Universal at $10 per person but no where was mentioned in the hotel. The Premium Shopping Outlet is opposite the hotel crossing the highway but you need to pay around $10 to cross the highway in a cab. They have contracted rates with transportastion company which are generally expensive. The availability of taxis on Palm Parkway is limited hence would have to choose the hotel contracted taxi. They have prompt service. Alternate would be to hire a car if you are planning to stay there for long. Overall, good experience.

Reviews.Title: “Best in town”
Reviews.Author: Nat7795
Reviews.Content: I just got home from a week at Disney. I called several places around Orlando area for a one night stay and everyone were dry humor. I reached Dee Dee on my last call and it was a pleasure talking with her. My wife and i booked just because of her. The rooms were normal size, nicely furnished with granite and affordable. the breakfast was wonderful ( waffles, bagels,fruit,coffee,cereals etc.). The rooms were clean. My wife and I two weekends prior were at a upscale resort in Atlanta Ga ( Crown Plaza ) and the rooms in Orlando by far were superior. Our Disney room at alligator byoue. didn't come close. Location is across from down town Disney and minutes from parks excellent. Also free wirless not at disney. I had a customer that needed somthing but had to wait until my return because Disney charged 10.00 to access internet.

Reviews.Title: “OK, but nothing special”
Reviews.Author: TorontoKimmer
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel above the others in the area because of the great reviews on Trip Advisor, but I can't understand why it's rated so high (#2 in Orlando???). Staff was friendly and helpful. The bed was comfortable, and the room was clean and well equipped with a large bathroom and fridge and microwave. The location is good for access to the theme parks, Downtown Disney and the Outlet Malls. However, there are numerous other hotels at the same price point with the same amenities closer to the attractions. This hotel is located almost at the end of a strip of hotels, so any of the others would be closer. I stayed there for 3 days, and there was only one elevator in service the entire time, which made going up and down at busy times (during breakfast) to be quite time consuming. The continental breakfast was fine, but other than the Mickey Mouse waffles, nothing special. The breakfast room was quite crowded, and they ran out of a lot of options quite early, although they were good about replenishing supplies. Decent value for the money, but I'd try a different hotel next time.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel conditions, best location, excellent price/performance!”
Reviews.Author: Otavio001
Reviews.Content: I am already a recurring customer of Hampton Inn chain in US, and the most important thing for me is the price/performance. At Hampton, I have encountered exactly what I need (excelent bed, bathroom and breakfast) for the lowest price in the market. And the locations are perfect, specially this Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista. Family loved.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: bonniesch
Reviews.Content: Very nice Hampton convenient to stores and restaurants. Nice area to jog or walk. Clean room. Refrigerator and Microwave in rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista; OK, but that's about it.”
Reviews.Author: TheTrillium
Reviews.Content: I stayed here 3 nights for a quick golf trip with my brother. So, I didn't come for Disney World, Sea World, or Epcot. We knew it would be a family environment with kids, and this didn't bother us at all. I wanted to discuss this first to let people know it's still possible to stay here and do other things! The location is good. It's great for the theme parks I mentioned above (I think the hotel has shuttles to these places, but not sure). It was less than 10 minutes by car to each golf course we played (Shingle Creek and Marriott Grande Pines). It is walking distance to a fair amount of restaurants, but your choices are somewhat limited. I would say it was about 0.5 miles to the first business center cluster, and about another 0.4 miles to the intersection of Palm Parkway and HWY 535. I give a word of caution to those walking: it's fairly dark walking at night because there are little or no street lamps, so walk with another person (or in a group). There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, but just be careful. Even though you are in a highly populated tourist area for Disney, you never know what type of people are out and about. The room was clean and well kept, and the hotel overall was also clean. The room has a mini fridge, a wall AC unit (a bit noisy), and an old rear projection TV. It's rare to find these in hotels today, so I was disappointed with this. No, I wasn't here to watch TV, but it's also nice to have a nice TV to watch when you are settling down for bed. We smelled bug spray multiple times during our stay in the hotel: first in the elevator and once in one of the hallways. I guess it is Florida, and there are bugs, but you really don't want to walk around and smell that. I guess you also don't want bugs crawling around either? The hotel offers free parking (the lot fills up pretty nicely at night), free wireless internet, and free on site breakfast. The breakfast is your typical Hampton Inn spread, but their waffle maker produces Mickey Mouse Ear waffles for the kids. I am sure they enjoy it. The hotel elevators are VERY slow. My biggest problem was with security. I walked out the rear door of the hotel one morning and found it propped open with a piece of wood, allowing anyone without a hotel door key to "come on in". This is a pretty big security issue, and thus I can't really recommend the hotel. I wouldn't bring my wife and kid here because of it. I reported this to the front desk. The reply was the doors are checked around midnight and there was a uniformed guard walking the property. Well, I hope they check the doors more often than that. Also, I didn't see a guard once while on the property. For $88/night, it's a good deal for the location and what you get. I hope they work on their security a bit. I would at least research the area for other hotels for similar prices (and security) before deciding. Trust me, there are plenty of options.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: IrishLouise
Reviews.Content: This hotel is definitely excellent value and I cannot fault the hotel itself â€“ rooms were good and very spacious, the beds were comfortable, the bathroom was clean, the hotel facilities were great, breakfast was better than we expected and the staff were very polite & helpful. If you are happy to take the car everywhere with you whilst on holiday then this place is not to be missed! However, I would not go back to the Hampton Inn simply because it was just a little too far away from the restaurants & bars that were in the vicinity and when Iâ€™m on holiday I like to abandon the car in the evenings, for obvious reasons ï�Š 10 - 15 minutes is not very far to walk, but the pathway is not very well lit and for 2 girls walking in the dark at night (especially returning later in the evenings), it was a little unnerving in parts. The walking also became an issue whenever Orlando presented one of itâ€™s usual evening â€œdownpoursâ€�, and then driving to the restaurant park becomes a necessity. We noticed that the Radisson was much closer to the restaurants and bars and given that the price is not much different, if we go to Orlando again we would probably pay the extra to have the added convenience of closer proximity to eateries & bars in the evenings. But I must stress that this was only an issue because of our personal preference on holiday to abandon the car in the evenings and relax with a few drinks â€“ the hotel itself cannot be faulted at all and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. It is convenient for theme parks, factory outlets and very easy to find. It is definitely deserving of itâ€™s position of the 2nd best hotel to stay in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “World class service, comfortable rooms, great breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: MrsBarg
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights, after spending a week in a condo in Indian Shores. I was a little dubious as the price was so good in comparison to other hotels in Orlando but I went based on the Trip Advisor comments and they were not wrong. We couldnt fault this hotel, check in was straight forward and 10 minutes after we checked into the room, they called us to check we were happy with it - we didnt get that from our 5 * hotel in Miami (and they are part of the same chain!). The beds were comfortable and the room was a good size. We over looked the pool, the hotel was very quiet, no slamming of doors etc late at night! Breakfast was buffet style and was included in our good rate. It offered a range of hot and cold foods from scrambled egg, omlettes to cereals and muffins - it was probably the best breakfast we have ever had which was good as we needed the energy for the parks! We booked our tickets via the concierge who is there from 7-11am every morning. We had a car so we were able to get to the parks easily but not sure how we would have done so if we hadn't got one. There was a small complex of shops, pubs and restaurants close by. We ate at the Crab House on the first night which was okay but not fantastic, see other review on Trip advisor for more detail and also the Havana Cafe which was a cuban restaurant and very good, also see other review on trip advisor. One night we also ordered chinese to the room as we were too knackered to go out! We also loved the free wi fi in he rooms. The pool was on the small side but was ample and was very quiet. one complaint I would have if I have to have one is that the shower pressure was very weak and with thick curly hair it is not good for getting the soap out! I would definitely recommend this hotel to others, but I get the feeling that all Hampton Inn's will be the same.

Reviews.Title: “Just right!”
Reviews.Author: helenedixon
Reviews.Content: we stayed as a couple for a total of 5 nights in September, while we were on a home-made fly drive holiday all around Floria. There was ample parking and the staff at reception were more than helpful in suggesting places to eat and even had a screw driver for me to borrow to change my plug on my hairdryer! The breakfast was included in the price and was buffet style.....as long as you don't mind eating and drinking out of polystyrene then you will be fine! The pool area was clean and relatively quiet. we even used the gym - once! Overall it was just right for this type of holiday. There are loads of places to eat nearby and it is about 5 mins from sea world/discovery cove/Aquatica and about 3 mins drive from Disney (15 min walk max). Book in advance for better rates as we re-booked a room for the end of our holiday while we were in the USA and the price then went up.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: UNCfanVal
Reviews.Content: The location is perfect. It is right off one of the Disney entrances. Downtown Disney is about a 5 min ride. There are also many places to eat around the hotel. There is also a grocery store down the street. If you aren't staying in a Disney hotel this is a great place to stay and great value. It's also not too far from Universal if you do a day or two there. The front desk staff is very friendly and if you need something fixed in your room, someone is up there within 5-10 minutes. The breakfast had a great selection and the mickey mouse waffles were a great added touch. The rooms are very clean and have been upgraded. The hotel is close to the freeway, but you can't hear it at all. I will definitely stay here the next time I come to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “The Hampton Lake Buena Vista Offers World Class Service.”
Reviews.Author: HamptonFan
Reviews.Content: I was in Orlando to participate in a business show at a larger more expensive hotel. I and my collegues decided to stay at a Hampton Inn because of our good experiences in the past and the good value. However, we had a large amount of equipment, signs, etc. for the business show. In addition to the excellent rooms and great breakfast, the team at the LBV Hampton accepted and stored all of our many equipment shipments, stored our boxes while we were at the show for multiple days and assisted with the shipment of the boxes after the show. We are fans of Hampton but we were truly 'blown away' by this service that truly went above and beyond. Thank you to the management and staff at the Lake Bueno Vista Hampton Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Great Servce, extremely clean, convenient location”
Reviews.Author: Peoriaguy1000
Reviews.Content: I spent several nights at this Hampton Inn. It was convenient to Disney. The staff went above & beyond to make this a good stay. We were booked in for only one night but liked it so well we cancelled our reservation at another hotel & stayed here several more days. It was a great value, breakfast was good and the housekeeping staff went the extra mile to keep the room clean. It also has a nice pool area. I will stay here again & would recommend it highly.
