Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: shlonk
Reviews.Content: Very clean room, great breakfast, were very pleased with the timings of the free shuttle service to Disney land (twice morning and 3 timings for return). Location is great and is walking distance to Orlando premium outlet, many restaurants and shops around and very close to Kissimmee area (lots of Halal food options for Muslims), we are definitely going to chose this hotel is we planned another visit to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL IN FANASTIC LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: glenberry
Reviews.Content: Checked in during a thunderstorm - but anyone who knows the sunshine state will understand that is does get more than it's fair share of rain. Greated with a free cookie and a very pleasant greeting. Rooms good = good size, well equipped, clean and comfortable. Following morning had a good self serve breakfast and checked out. The hotel is in Palm Parkway - which is very close to Interstate 4 and the North entrance to Disney world - the one near Downtown Disney. Up Palm Parkway and Turkey Lake gets you to Sea World, International Drive and Universal without going on Interstate, We have stayed at lots of mid price hotels in this area - and this is wthout doubt one of the best

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: jazzo
Reviews.Content: This was one of the best places we stayed at on our trip to the US. It was super clean, the linens were crisp and great smelling, the beds were OH so comfortable, especially after a huge day shopping. The place was very quiet and well insulated. The breakfast buffet was yummy, especially the waffles. We stayed here for 3 days and throughly enjoyed ourselves. They also had a big pool, free parking, free internet, lots of satelite channels. We would stay here next time we go to Orlando, without a second thought. And not to forget, this is THE best location in Orlando, very close to Disney Land, Florida Mall and all the outlet shopping and also half way between Kennedy Space Centre and Daytona beach.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant hotel, very helpful staff, and we slept great !!”
Reviews.Author: Tillyseattle
Reviews.Content: We arrived at 7:30 am, and they allowed us to check in early, which was wonderful (they'd had a vacancy the night before, so we were lucky). The staff at the front desk were always helpful and pleasant. The breakfasts were pretty good (with great coffee). It was very close to Disney world, multiple restaurants, and lots of shopping. The thing we appreciated the most though, was how quiet it was. We never heard any neighbors ! It is an older hotel, but was very clean and well kept, and the room was spacious.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay near Downtown Disney”
Reviews.Author: kfovargue
Reviews.Content: In order to avoid a busy, crowded conference center, we stayed a mile away from the conference. We made a great decision! The to-go breakfast was a special touch, and we never had to wait more than 5 minutes for transportation. The microwave and fridge is another perk along with free Wi-Fi. Thanks for an enjoyable stay!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and good location!”
Reviews.Author: 1TripAtATime
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 1 night. Check in was pleasant and very easy! Room was very clean! Nice buffet style breakfast, free parking and free internet access. Close to I-4, Lake Buena Vista and Disney World. Great deal - with the AAA discount we paid less than $75 for the night. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, clean rooms, comfortable bed and great location!!”
Reviews.Author: PrincessTerri
Reviews.Content: What I love most about this hotel is that I do not hear my neighbors talking or their TV because the hotel was built well insulated and the rooms are very quite. I have insomnia and I use to dread going to hotels because I would be woken at all hours of the night and early morning from guests returning to their rooms. But I sleep very well at this hotel. It is always clean and I am always comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: FRENCHBADGER
Reviews.Content: We spent only one night. but was pleasant experience. This is an great hotel, very good location (near Downtown Disney and all the Orlando parks). Lot of restaurants not too far away. The rooms are very clean and come equipped with a small refrigerator and microwave. The hotel staff is very friendly. The buffet breakfast is awesome. we really ecommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “I slept like a little lamb, oh,oh, so comfortable!”
Reviews.Author: Nesi34473
Reviews.Content: The clerks were helpful and pleasant, we felt welcomed. Whenever we visit Orlando Fl. and need to stay over Hampton Inn will be the hotel, a home away from home. A wonderful experience.

Reviews.Title: “Always a wonderful time and always return”
Reviews.Author: marketbasketcase
Reviews.Content: This Hampton Inn has always provided us superb accommodations. From the food to the rooms everything including the staff is outstanding. We have been coming here for a number of years along with several of our closest friends and each year we are always greeted with warmth and professionalism. The location is within minutes to several Orlando attractions. The breakfast buffet offers a variety of food and is always refreshed so nothing is ever empty. The rooms are always clean and fresh. We could not be any happier and highly recommend this to those wanting to stay at a great hotel for their vacation

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel to stay in Orlando... with an affordable price!”
Reviews.Author: Jill022
Reviews.Content: The Hampton Inn has been the best hotel I've stayed in Orlando. I had a fantastic experience. I traveled with family who were from overseas and it was their first time visiting Orlando and the parks. I was very concerned because I wanted them to have a great experience, the hotel was the icing on the cake! The service, the complementary breakfast, the location, everything about it was EXCELLENT! This will be my choice of hotel for many years to come. If you are traveling with family or by yourself, I recommend 100% this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Experience”
Reviews.Author: sue3580
Reviews.Content: My sister and I recently stayed at this hotel to find a very good experience. The hotel staff was exceptional and considerate. The room was clean as was the breakfast area. The beds are so comfortable that I hated to get up. The towels seemed extra soft also. It has been a long time since we have had such a pleasant experience with a hotel chain! We will visit this hotel in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: posmanti
Reviews.Content: I have to agree with prior TA posts - this place is an excellent value. We stayed for one night only prior to an 8 night stay on Disney property. The front desk staff was very friendly. Our room request was cheerfully honored -- and we were pleased with the very clean, if not smallish, room. The two queen beds were comfortable. I imagine some would find the small fridge and microwave useful. We did not use it. The TV is the old 27" CRT type -- but, it worked fine. The breakfast was standard Hampton Inn fare -- but, certainly good enough. For $59 per night, this was an outstanding value.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous hotel”
Reviews.Author: cowbhai
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent hotel, just minutes from Downtown Disney and all the Walt Disney World Resort parks. The rooms are very clean and come equipped with a small refrigerator and microwave. The hotel staff is courteous and friendly. The scrumptious hot and cold buffet breakfast with rotating items is awesome! Freshly baked "Mickey" waffles are a delight will bring a smile to any child's face.

Reviews.Title: “Thoroughly enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: Richan
Reviews.Content: I went here based on reviews from this site. I went for relaxation and I did just that at this hotel. I was pleased with the cleanliness of the room and bathroom. The breakfast was good, waffles each morning, with rotating hot foods- bacon, sausage, omelettes, french toast sticks, hash browns. Scrambled eggs were available each morning, along w/ 3 typs of cold cereals, a variety of oatmeal, a variety of baked goods, yogurts, various herbal teas and of course coffee and juice. The food was plentiful, there were plenty of tables to sit and enjoy breakfast. By 10am, the families with children were gone to the parks and I had the place pretty much to myself. I relaxed by the pool and hot tub, plenty of towels readily available right by the pool entrance. The location is good, you are within 5-10 min drive of just about any restaurant you can think of. Also, there is a small shopping plaza within walking distance. For families- each room w/ a fridge and microwave, a supermarket is 5 minutes away as well as a Walmart, so you can save some money on food, if you wish. Also, the Walmart had plenty of Disney souvenirs so you may want to buy them there instead of at the parks--they even had fuzzy Mickey mouse ears and Disney character backpacks. I drove to Cocoa Beach for one day of my 5 day trip. It was 50 mins to an hour away and a nice way to spend the morning and early afternoon. Overall, I will return to this hotel, it was just the getaway I needed in a clean, comfortable place.

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: fonz75
Reviews.Content: During my trip to Orlando FL, I had originally booked for only one night at this hotel after the week at my timeshare ended. This place is "GREAT" as soon as I walked into the hotel I noticed how clean and I wold even call it "luxurious". I was very impressed with the room I got the first night I was there. "Granite" counter tops in my room's restroom? WOW!!!!! That was a first! Everything in the room was perfect.........I even booked three more nights! VERY IMPRESSED!!!! Everyone I met at the front desk was either very "friendly and professional" or far beyond that... Thank you, Airen Rojas! They have breakfast everyday in the morning from 6am to 10am and its GREAT. In the lobby they have a big screen TV with a very comfortable living room setup where you can sit and relax. This hotel is very centralized and close to all attractions. There are plenty of places to eat one block away. The price they quoted me at the front desk per night was $79 per night which was a little more than what I wanted to spend; I went online to Orbitz.com typed Hampton Inn Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the search bar and booked through Orbitz, saving $10 making it $69 per night. I think it was worth it even if you are in a budget. Very quiet at night and my room was two doors away from the lobby. I'll definitely stay there again!!!!! Did I mention they have a pool and a really cool gym? They do!!! Bottom line, I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: tollmanwi
Reviews.Content: Just returned from Orlando and spent 1 night at this Hampton Inn. Paid $44 for a Saturday night stay with Free Breakfast. The hotel was 2 minutes from Downtown Disney. Beautiful, well maintained and clean. Loved it and would stay again. We went from here to the Disney All Star Movies. We wished we stayed at the Hampton Inn the whole vacation.

Reviews.Title: “An excellent hotel in a quite location, yet still really close to all the main theme parks”
Reviews.Author: vacationPete
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent hotel in the perfect quite location, yet still close to all the main theme parks and shopping malls. All the staff were really friendly and helpful. The rooms looked to have been recently redecorated and ours was very clean and fresh. A hot buffet breakfast was included in the price and tea and coffee was available 24 hours a day. The swimming pool and hot tub were loverly and as most people spent all day at the theme parks they were free from other people most of the time. There was also a small but well equipped gym on the ground floor which was also available all of the time. The hotel has free WIFI, and free parking, with plenty of spaces right next to the hotel. (Unlike some hotels in the area where you almost require a shuttle bus to get from the parking lot back to the hotel). I would think that this hotel would be hard to beat on value for money anywhere in the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “the best stay ever, we loved this hotel”
Reviews.Author: lindsayd57
Reviews.Content: Thank you to all the staff at Hampton Inn, Lake Buena Vista, who were so helpful and friendly. This hotel was everything I had hoped for. I chose it because of the good reviews on Tripadvisor, and was not dissappointed. The room was clean, the beds comfortable and the breakfast delicious. You have made our visit to Orlando a good one - believe me, a hotel can make or break a holiday! The shuttle to Disney and another to an outlet Mall, made the trip so carefree and saves you the $15 parking fee at Disney World. From Epcot you can get another shuttle to any of the other Disney Parks, then back to Epcot, where your hotel shuttle will pick you up. Don't forget to book a time with the hotel shuttle for return. We had aching muscles and feet after spending busy days at Disney World, so coming 'home' to the friendly faces at reception, then a good cup of (free) coffee then a warm bath and the most comfortable bed was the absolute best. I cannot find fault with this place and recommend it 100%.

Reviews.Title: “The best home away from home”
Reviews.Author: LisaMyers
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed at this hotel from March 31, 2010 until April 6, 2010 with her High School Band. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. I knew when I planned to return to the area later in the summer, I wanted to stay here. We did, and I will do so in the future when coming to the Orlando area. The hotel is so nice. The rooms are clean and comfortable. I want to take the bed home with me.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, friendly, close to Disney and walking distance to restaraunts”
Reviews.Author: Mitriza
Reviews.Content: The free breakfast in the morning sold this hotel for us. It was hot and good. The boys loved the Mickey pancakes. The room was nice, beds comfy and no outside noise. The pool is a little small, but adequate. Staff is very courteous and helpful. We'll definitely stay here next time.

Reviews.Title: “It was just wonderful”
Reviews.Author: marcolmotta
Reviews.Content: I was staying in this hotel on 7 to July 22, 2010. The staff are friendly, courteous and very helpful, from sunrise to sunset we are greeted with smiles. I am suggesting to my friends who visit Orlando to stay at the Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista.

Reviews.Title: “A best kept secret, in a land of endless hotel choices”
Reviews.Author: Candldad
Reviews.Content: Wanted everyone to know what a terrific time we had at the Hampton Inn Orlando/LBV. Due to a change in travel plans, we needed to find a hotel both before and after our stay on-site at a Disney resort. While the first hotel we stayed at was "OK", the Hampton Inn proved to be a great finish to our stay in Orlando. Welcoming, VERY willing to accommodate an early arrival, with a spacious, comfortable and spotless room, this Hampton Inn scored high marks in every detail. Wireless service was excellent, as was the complimentary breakfast (the staff of which was really put through their paces!), but the most enjoyable aspect was the welcoming, friendly staff. I would highly recommend travelers to consider the Hampton Inn Orlando/LBV... you'll enjoy every minute!

Reviews.Title: “Great Time”
Reviews.Author: Jonel109
Reviews.Content: Everyone was so nice and I will be back. I was greeted with a smile and I felt very welcomed. I forgot my toothbrush and the front desk was very helpful to get me one. The beds were a little hard but I was happy to see a mattress protector on both brds. I was very impressed with that.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Comfortable Room, very convenient to WDW”
Reviews.Author: esgordon
Reviews.Content: We only stayed at the Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista for 1 night before we checked into the Beach Club, but we had a very nice stay there. If I planned to visit WDW and stay off site, this place would certainly get by business. The staff was very nice, the rooms had 2 queen beds with new white duvets and linens. Plenty of fluffy pillows and a comfortable mattress. The room also had a small refrigerator for your use. The hotel also offers free Wi-Fi. The b-fast in the morning was also delicious. Make your own full size Mickey Mouse shaped Waffles or enjoy eggs, bacon, sausage, fruit, cereal, pastries, or yogurt. This hotel is located almost directly across the street from the WDW entrance heading to Downtown Disney. From the hotel, you take a left out of the parking lot along a small road with other hotels on the sides and very little traffic. At the end of that road, take a left onto the main road and then an almost immediate right onto WDW property in the downtown Disney area. It was far enough off the main road that you don't have to worry about traffic noise, but close enough to have an ultra convenient location. This hotel is as convenient if you are driving as the DTD hotels without having the extra expense of parking and resort fees. It's on a road off the main drag that has lots of hotels. At the entrance to the road there is an Olive Garden. I can't recall what other restaurants were along the road but it seemed like a very convenient location for eating off site.

Reviews.Title: “Management sucks! Don't bring a extended family here!”
Reviews.Author: bflores
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased to get a hotel to cater to our family reunion until we were into day 2 with the entire family there. We were told they didn't have a meeting room for us but had a large lobby that we could take advantage of to gather in as this was a "family reunion." Our grandfather has always loved having these family reunions and he is in his 80's now and can only travel so far from home. Our family planner that got the hotel for us was assured we would have a pleasant time in the lobby. We had a "pizza" get together and started to play cards. I was pulled to the side by a man wearing a pair of shorts and tee shirt with a ball cap on. He tells me he is the manager and that we need to leave the lobby cause we are too loud. Hummm, when we made the reservations no one told us that we had to act as if we were in a library. We were told we would have the back room for our get together. They over booked and we were in the front lobby. Even the girls at the desk didn't have a problem with us being there. There were NO complaints to them either. So where did he get that we were being too loud? When I left to my room a couple of times and came back to the lobby there was no noise past the computer room. Not only did he say we had to leave he then said we may have the cops called on us! What?????? You have got to be kidden!!!!! When I told our Aunt about this she wanted to talk to the "manager" and 45 min later and only after she told the girls at the counter did he finally show up to only wave in her face and say "I won't talk to you!" Our family ended up going separate ways for the rest of the time cause there was no set place we could all meet. It separated our family at our family reunion. My son will be leaving for boot camp Aug 8th and will go straight into active duty. This may have been his last family reunion for many years to come. I will never spend my money at a Hampton Inn again. I will post to my facebook, myspace and everywhere else to make sure that no one has this kind of experience with them again. Holiday Inn has always been great to our reunions and they will now get all of our business in the future. Very disgusted on the treatment we received and not only our family but another family reunion party was treated the same way while we were there! Between all of our rooms we had booked between the 2 family reunions we had over 40 rooms!!!!! That is alot of money!

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: ripineros
Reviews.Content: I decided to give this hotel a try for my Orlando Disney Vacations. At first I was skeptic given the low price, but I was surprised when I got there, beatiful building, very clean rooms and prompt room service as well as fitness center and a convenient shuttle to disney parks. On top of that, the free breakfast was really nice and it was varied (a lot of hot food) and the free parking is always nice as well.

Reviews.Title: “The staff was very friendly and the rooms were clean.”
Reviews.Author: mtsupilot
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this hotel. The staff was very friendly and the hotel was convenient to Disney and other Orlando Attractions. We will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: FiaAlu
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 weeks while visiting Orlando and Tampa attractions. This is not a resort hotel, it offers basic accommodations. Our rooms were very clean (my #1 priority) and comfortable. It met our needs because we didn't have plans to spend a lot of time at the hotel. We stayed on the 5th floor and a few times we got back around 2 or 3 to freshen up and our rooms weren't ready so make sure to request early housekeeping services if needed. The only noise was the slamming doors from inconsiderate neighbors. Laundry can be done at the Extended Stay next door when you show your room key. I used the advanced pay option so the rooms were paid for and check out was easy. The staff was friendly and professional. The breakfast included bagels, muffins, make your own waffles, eggs (imitation), sausage, french toast sticks, cereal, yogurt, fruit, and juices. The juices were watery but overall I thought the breakfast was good. We had our own transportation so we didn't use the hotel Shuttle to Disney World. It was really easy to navigate to all of our destinations. If you have your own transportation, there are lots of restaurants that are a few minutes drive away. There is a Pizza Hut and a small shopping center with a couple restaurants on the same street as the hotel. Of course driving past these locations, they look close to the hotel but an actual walk may not seem so short (I didn't try it). One day, I took a taxi from Seaworld b/c I needed to come back to the hotel earlier than the rest of my family and the cost was $10 one way (not incl. tip). I liked this hotel and would stay again based on the value, location, and the cleanliness of the facility.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: -Traveller4Life-82
Reviews.Content: This hotel was just Great! It was located on a quiet street but also so close to the parks and attractions. The buffet was great, although some days it took a while for the staff to replenish the food supply. The pool was nice and warm, the rooms comfortable and the price was excellent! Planning on staying there again at our next Orlando vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Great Quick Trip”
Reviews.Author: drputtswell
Reviews.Content: While this Hampton Inn isn't the newest in the chain, the staff was very friendly and helpful - above and beyond the call of duty. Very clean and quiet rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay...Great Value”
Reviews.Author: SoFLTraveler
Reviews.Content: Got a great deal on a three night stay at the Hampton Inn website. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Check-in by a really sweet lady took all of 1 minute. The room was standard issue Hampton Inn...modern and comfortable. Rug looked a bit worn/needed a shampoo, and there were a few crumbs in the corner. Rooms come with large fridge/microwave combo. Free internet was a bit slow, there were computers in the lobby. Bathroom was clean with nice granite counter, basic toiletries, and large fluffy towels. Good hot water. Buffet breakfast was good, but basic. I ate really early twice and it was empty, but on my last day the place was jammed with families at about 7:30AM. Location is good for the parks....ask about getting to/from I-4 without having to go to SR-535, the busy Apopka-Vineland Road. A lot of people seem to complain about the transportation to the parks. This is a problem from all but the very expensive Disney Properties. Since you are spending $thousands on your vacation, spend an extra $12 and drive your own car to the park of your choice. You can come and go as you please, and you never have to worry about missing the last bus. For the price, this is a comfortable, clean hotel, that offers a convenient free breakfast. I will definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but awful breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: nowincolorado
Reviews.Content: This is a nice Hampton Inn, staff very friendly, rooms very clean. We really liked this hotel and considered staying for our entire 5 nights at Disney but glad we didn't. We liked our room, we thought the staff was the best and the price was awesome! Even after tax, we only paid $88.88 - the cheapest hotel of our 9 day trip - we drove to DisneyWorld and stayed at 4 Hampton Inns along the way & 4 nights at a Disney Resort. It really, really is a great deal to stay here & be so close to Disney. However, there were two reasons why we are glad we didn't stay here the remaining 4 nights at Disney. We stayed here because we wanted 5 nights at a Disney Resort Hotel but they were booked and we could only get in for 4 nights - so we stayed at this Hampton Inn before moving onto the Disney Resort Hotel. The reason we are glad we stayed at the Disney Resort Hotel was for the convenience of the shuttle buses - our Disney Resort Hotel had different shuttle buses going to ALL the different Disney Parks - most leaving every 30 minutes from early morning to past midnight. This was amazing convenient! This Hampton Inn has a shuttle bus that goes to Epcot only & only twice a day - like 8:30 am and 12:30pm - so if you miss it, you are out of luck. Plus they have only one return time - it was something like 5:45pm which you need a reservation for. We wanted to stay late to see the Epcot fireworks and if we used the Hampton shuttle, we couldn't have done that. Once at Epcot - if you wanted to go to Magic Kingdom you'd have to leave Epcot on a monorail to a transportation center then take another monorail to Magic Kingdom - very time consuming. I notice another guest complained about the shuttle service from Hampton and I also noticed that the management frequently responds to guest comments on tripadvisor so I'm sure they'll be reading this review. The management responded to the other guest's review by saying "Free Shuttle to parks: Disney controls where they allow such shuttle services to drop off guests. Once at Epcot guests can take Disney's own internal shuttles to any park you want." So in the hotel's defense, I could see how limited they are due to Disney's rules but it is still not guest friendly. But I did think of a great solution! IF guests at Hampton have a vehicle with them and do not need to use the shuttle, it is still cheaper to stay at the Hampton Inn & drive to the Disney Park of your choice & pay $15 to park there - with direct access to the park you are visiting instead of paying $$$ to stay at a Disney Resort Hotel like we did. We thought of this only after we moved to the Disney Resort Hotel so we could have access to more direct shuttles. The second reason I didn't like this Hampton Inn was the awful breakfast! Out of 8 hotel breakfasts on our trip - this was the worst! Only 3 choices of cereal from a dispenser - which was not labeled - were those regular cheerios or honey nut cheerios?? Milk from a dispenser. No fresh fruit, but cut up fruit chunks served in a bowl. Their fruit chunks looked spoiled. I can say this because the night before we stayed at a Hampton Inn in Mobile, AL which had an amazing breakfast serving the same cut fruit chucks which looked like fruit and tasted good. This Hamptonâ€™s fruit looked pale and awful and not like fruit. They had 1 choice of muffins along with a bread selection to toast. Their "hot" breakfast had 3 choices - none were hot. In fact, they had an egg dish topped with shredded cheese that was so cold, the cheese wasn't even melted. And lastly - they had 1 and only 1 waffle maker for tons and tons of guests. The line to a make a waffle was very long & to make it worse - each person was making 3-4 waffles which took extra time. I don't blame them for making waffles for their entire family at the same time. I waited and waited and finally got to cook my waffle, shaped like Mickey Mouse. The waffle tasted awful - like cardboard. I never use syrup on pancakes or waffles and had to for this waffle since it tasted so awful. However, again - in the hotel's defense - I can understand why they don't offer more convenient breakfast foods - like choices of cereal boxes, milk cartons, fresh fruit, danishes, lots of muffins, lots of bread options, peanut butter or jelly. Because guests could pack an entire cooler with "to-go" options to eat later in the day at Disney. I've see that at other hotels - people grabbing food to go as they left to eat on their road trip. This is a great hotel, clean hotel, friendly staff, very close to Disney and a great deal for the money. If you can park at a Disney Park and not worry about the shuttle - do so - it's still a great deal. But don't count on a decent breakfast here.

Reviews.Title: “Love this Hampton Inn!”
Reviews.Author: LydiaMKClearwater_FL
Reviews.Content: We absoulutely love this hotel. Since discovering this location we never stay anywhere else when traveling to the Orlando area. It is so convient to all the places we visit - Disney, outlet shopping, Sea World, Barnies coffee. The staff, especially Brittany this trip, is always friendly and knowlegeable. Plus Hampton Inn has the most comfortable beds!!

Reviews.Title: “Good value, Good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Conniec56
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean, modern bathroom, plenty of towels. Beds were comfortable and decent. We had the pool to ourselves and it was nice, but nothing special. I will say that the brick was so hot around the pool that we could not walk on it, so I highly recommend flip flops at all times on the pool area. After reading the reviews here, I thought the motel would be much more convenient. It was somewhat out of the way, but not a big deal. The only complaints I had was, one, that after a long day at Disney, we came back and I wanted a nice, hot shower, but the water was not nearly hot enough for me and, two, there was noise from above after we went to bed that woke us up. The gentleman that checked us in was not overly friendly, but the others at the desk we talked to were very helpful and friendly. I thought the breakfast was very good and that was one thing that would definitely bring me back.

Reviews.Title: “Great value hotel”
Reviews.Author: MelBsAs
Reviews.Content: A friend and I stayed at the Hampton Inn for 9 days and loved it, great hotel! Clean, plenty of towels, comfortable, with refrigerator & microwave, 24 hr coffee service, pool & whirlpool, very close to Disney parks and Orlando Outlets, plus breakfast included. Excellent service all around. Would definitely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for the Price”
Reviews.Author: Emma155032
Reviews.Content: We are a family of 4 with two younger children. The purpose of our trip was to spend a long weekend at Disney. The check-in at the hotel was super quick (we had reserved on Expedia.ca) and the room was exactly as expected. Clean and updated room with a bar sized fridge & a microwave. The only complaint that my hubby had was that the room smelled a little musty....but it was very hot & humid in Orlando during our visit and a musty room could be seen as "normal" - given the weather conditions. The complimentary breakfast was just enough for the kids & us - with enough variety to have a different breakfast each morning of our stay. The pool & hot tub were nice, but the grounds surrounding the pool area could use a little more care. All in all great value for the low price.

Reviews.Title: “excellent stay.”
Reviews.Author: john77voodoo
Reviews.Content: the service was excellent. the room was clean. it was minutes from downtown disney. the pool was ok & the whirlpool was cold. the room had a refrigerator,and coffeemaker. the hotel had free 24 hr coffee. and free breakfast buffet.I found a good deal on hotels.ca $ 35 a day.

Reviews.Title: “VERY GOOD!!!”
Reviews.Author: Esteter
Reviews.Content: I was staying at this hotel and I must go on record to efficiency, competence and attention of officials, especially the reception. I appreciate the kindness and professionalism of all employees without exception. Hygiene and cleaning should also be stressed because I have nothing to complain about this hotel. Very good and recommend it to everyone. I spent very nice days, I felt like I was in my house.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable rooms”
Reviews.Author: AnetNeil
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean, up to date and the most comfortable beds I've ever slept in - in a motel. I generally do not sleep well away from home, but we slept like babies. The room was spotless each day when we returned and there were plenty of clean towels. We did not use the coffee maker - there was always coffee & tea available downstairs. The free breakfast was wonderful and everyone we dealt with was very nice. If we go back, we will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Always A Pleasant Stay”
Reviews.Author: jwmATL
Reviews.Content: Wonderful rooms, comfortable beds, friendly staff and a hot/cold breakfast included (with Mickey waffles). What more could you ask for when you are spending your day in the parks! It's only 1 mile from Downtown Disney and 15 minutes to any Disney park. This is our hotel of choice when we are in the area. I also noticed that they provided shuttles to the parks, too.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful visit...great location”
Reviews.Author: fritogator
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay...close to shopping, eating and theme parks. Extremely helpful & courteous personnel. Enjoyed our stay tremendously!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed Friendly & Comfortable Stay”
Reviews.Author: boboakville
Reviews.Content: I stay at many Hampton Inn properties. In this case, I had a conference at a Disney hotel but their costs were out of line. Hampton Inn provided great value - close to venue, about 15 minute drive) and business oriented - breakfast and free WiFi. This Hampton Inn was up to the standard I expect. The only down sides were (1) the desk chair is too low to comfortably work at for long and (2) the air conditioner is noisy at night, but necessary - any way to make them quieter? These are small points but important to business travelers. Overall, a good stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: frogsoup
Reviews.Content: The hotel has been a pleasure to stay in. The hotel has made accomodations for us when we needed them every time. I am extremely pleased with the level of customer service that the Buena Vista Hampton Inn has demonstrated to Voith Paper. We have recommended this hotel to our peers as a result of the excellent service that we have been given. We look forward to staying here each time we have business in the Orlando area in the future.

Reviews.Title: “This is a Five Star Hotel, no hesitation to recommend.”
Reviews.Author: herrzeus
Reviews.Content: We arrived at 2 am and were greeted by a friendly, cheerful, young lady named Christine. She assisted us in a professional and friendly manner. She was very understanding and concerned about our comfort as our luggage was lost in transit. The next morning and for six consecutive days, Amanda was our pleasant greeter and always had a kind word, a helpful hint or just a pleasant smile that made us feel welcome. She went above and beyond to make our stay a memorable one. She was resourceful and seemed to understand what it takes to make the stay pleasant. Of course there was also a new employee, Brittany, who also assisted us in the selection of eateries and gave us coupons to us. She was pleasant and smiled and made our stay a happy one. Being in the people business myself, a retired school administrator, I know how difficult it is to always please people. But with people like three individuals I just mentioned, Hampton Inns and Suites will retain many happy customers for years to come. If We are ever in Florida again, I will assure you it is Lake Buena Vista Hampton Inn for us. We are Hilton Honors members and I intend to write Hilton so these individuals get the recognition they deserve. Thanks for a wonderful vacation as this was a celebration for us as she is a cancer survivor. As Disney said - you have to believe and it will come true.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks for making our student trip so successful.”
Reviews.Author: LauraFortMyers_FL
Reviews.Content: After much research and reading every review posted, we chose the Hampton Inn for our student trip to the Florida State Science Fair. Our traveling party included 28 students, 5 adult chaperones and parents. We booked a total of 30 rooms for two nights. The rooms were clean and spacious. Beds were comfortable. The complimentary breakfast was great and very much appreciated when traveling with students. The hotel staff was very welcoming and accomodating. From my first contact with the group reservation manager, Ramon Gomez; to arrange our room block through our departure check-out, we were treated wonderfully. We would highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling with student groups, families or singles. Thank you Hampton Inn for all your staff did to make our trip successful and memorable.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort Close to the Action”
Reviews.Author: MaddashGainesvilleFL
Reviews.Content: We spent the weekend at Disney and it was great to know we had a clean, comfortable room to return to as well as a pool and hot tub to relax in.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Disney area lodging. Def A++”
Reviews.Author: kseabolt
Reviews.Content: We stayed here after a 1-day visit to Magic Kingdom. We were about 7 miles (and just minutes) from Magic Kingdom. We came in late and tired after a busy Disney Day to find the check-in "fast and friendly" and the beds absolutely divine! Maybe I was just exhausted but there is something to that "Hampton Bed" because I swear I've never slept that well in a hotel in my life! I appreciate that all-white bedding - I like a clean I can see! In the morning we were pleasantly surprised to find the complimentary breakfast offered make-your-own Mickey-shaped waffles (a real hit with the kids), fresh fruit, and even "man food" like sausage and eggs ;-) Standard complimentary breakfast fare but with ample seating and great coffee too! My kids had no real idea that they didn't stay at a "Disney hotel" and the <100 room rate could not be beat. I would definitely and HIGHLY recommend this hotel to anyone traveling in the Disney area.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly,good location and good quality.”
Reviews.Author: garethjm
Reviews.Content: Very clean with spacious nice room. Location and breakfast was very good. Pool, jacuzzi and gym good. Staff very helpfull and obliging. Only downside was no bar facilities to relax in at evening time and children dominating business center using computers for facebook. Enjoyed stay and would recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: AU-GNV-FL
Reviews.Content: Stayed here 3 nights while visiting the Disney Parks. Hotel is about 1.5 miles from the Disney entrance at 535/Hotel Plaza Blvd. Less than 5 minutes to Downtown Disney, can reach any of the parks in 10 minutes. Plenty of restaurants and stores nearby. Good access to I-4 means you can also get to any outlet mall or Universal in10 minutes as well. Hotel was nice, had a free breakfast, pool and exercise room that are above the norm for most Hampton Inn's. Plenty of parking, staff was polite and easy to work with. Would definitely return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Hampton Inn A++”
Reviews.Author: LovestoFly
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hampton Inn Orlando for 3 nites in Jan 2010. The staff was the BEST! Super helpful and very accommodating. I changed rooms after the 1st nite because my room was across from the elevators and it was too noisy for me to sleep. They had a new room ready for me in 15 minutes even delivered the new room key to my room and offered to move my luggage and help me pack. Now that is A+ service. The next day when the gentleman at the front desk saw me he asked how my new room was and if I was happy. I was stunned and happy that he not only remembered my issue but even my name. I've stayed in some 5 star hotels and you dont get servicve like that. Even the staff that was working at the breakfast buffett came around to make sure everyone was happy. I have stayed at alot of Hampton Inns and other Hilton Properities and this Hampton Inn is the BEST! It is conviently located to restaurants, parks shopping, etc. I would definately stay there again and would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Super Nice hotel, very close to attractions”
Reviews.Author: bpiercy
Reviews.Content: We traveled with an 18 month old and a 6 year old. The hotel had a crib already waiting when we arrived that night. Our 6 year old loved the cookies before bed, the pool and the breakfast. Every staff member we met were very polite and courteous. The hotel was very very close to Sea World, but was very quiet and off the main highway. I would recommend this hotel to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: sjms71
Reviews.Content: This is was our first stay to this hotel. We stayed 9 nights with two childeren 9 & 12. Location was great. Breakfast every morning was awesome. The best part .......It was very clean. I am very, bery picky. I'm the person who brings the lysol wipes and goes over everything and I didn't need too. Although I did anyway OCD thing :o). The staff was very nice and professional. It was chilly the week we were there so it was nice to come back to the hotel and be able to have a cup of tea or coffee in the evening. My only issue but not a big one was there wasn't much dresser space for clothes but, certainly not a complaint. Oh, and it was very quiet the hotel appeared to be very full and we never heard a peep in other rooms or hallways.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT Stay”
Reviews.Author: vegasrick71
Reviews.Content: VERY close to Disney (one exit on I-4 and they also have a shuttle) Breakfast was very nice, especially the Mickey Mouse waffles. Service was friendly. Hotel is easy to find and within walking distance to several shops, resturaunts. Beds were comfortable and a fridge / microwave in the room was nice. The area seems pretty safe. No worries about walking around after dark. Will definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, great value for money”
Reviews.Author: Superbluegaa
Reviews.Content: I picked this hotel after hours on the Net trying to find something suitable. I think the breakfast was great, it saves you having to go out to look for somewhere in the mornings. I would have liked the pool to be heated as it was just too cold to use which was disappointing. Great location for the parks but off the manic strip too. Good availibility of places to eat close by. Would definitely recommend and use again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value -- Would choose again”
Reviews.Author: J13345
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Hampton Inn Orlando Lake Buena Vista for 4 nights to attend a conference at one of the Disneyworld resort hotels. If you were trying to combine the conference with taking family to enjoy the Disneyworld theme parks you might consider staying at one of the Disney resort hotels to take advantage of the convenience. But, for a solo business traveler limited both to budget and patience with product placement, staying offsite is the way to go. The HI-OLBV is right off I-4 about 20 minutes drive from Orlando airport and about 10 minute drive to the Magic Kingdom and Epcot. The hotelâ€™s neighbors on Palm Parkway (and for many square miles around) are other hotels, diners, fast food outlets, and tourist shops catering to Orlando tourism. I found the hotel staff courteous and efficient. The hotel and the grounds seemed decently kept up. The other guests appeared to be mostly families heading to enjoy the Disney theme parks. My room was clean and bright with no issues with any of its amenities or fixtures including a fridge and microwave in good working order. The wi-fi worked fine as well. The only odors were outside from the occasional cigarette smokers. The breakfast entrees changed just enough each morning for variety â€“ variations on scrambled eggs, ommeletes, sausage patties, waffles you make yourself, pastries, bagels, juices, and actually pretty good coffee. Overall, I would summarize my stay at HI-OLBV as positive for myself as a business traveler and would estimate that it would be positive for a family traveling to enjoy the Orlando resorts.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Stay With Great Extras”
Reviews.Author: feirin
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 5 nights total. The rooms were very spacious and clean. Staff was very helpful & attentive. The breakfast had a wide selection of items. My only gripe is that the outdoor pool was NOT heated. We would have liked to use this to relax after a long day visit local attractions. Otherwise I would highly recommend. Very close to all Disney Parks & attractions about 1-3 miles . Only a 10 minute drive on I-4 to Universal.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable and clean stay”
Reviews.Author: Violet2692
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean, and the customer service was exceptional. The continental breakfast had a variety of options, and was very satisfying. Some of the friends who were staying with me forgot various toiletries, and the staff gave them travel-size versions upon request. They also assisted us in getting directions. Everyone was very helpful, curteous, and efficient.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Vacation Experience”
Reviews.Author: billybonn
Reviews.Content: We travel frequently and always try to book a Hilton hotel and despite the fact we had the option of staying at a Disney complex we still chose the Hampton. You offer great amenities such as the complimentary breakfast and comfortable beds. We especially liked this location since the breakfast was very roomy. It is sometimes hard to find a seat in some of the other locations. Your staff were very friendly and accomodating, and as always the room was very clean. If we have one negative comment it is the design of your bathroom. Being 5' tall it is extremely difficult to reach the sink to brush your teeth. We do not like the height or design of the sink. Try it sometime. We also have a race team that we book into your Hilton hotels and they also voiced the same opinion about the height and design of the sink area. Our crew chief is also only 5' tall and had problems with shaving and brushing. Other then that we are very pleased!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised by the cleanliness of the rooms and hotel in general! We will definitely stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: missingflorida
Reviews.Content: I used Trip Advisor to search for a hotel for our Orlando trip for 4 days. After reading the reviews on the Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista, I chose this hotel for our stay. I am extremely picky (drives my husband crazy), and the Hampton Inn did NOT dissappoint! The room was the cleanest room that we have ever stayed in out of the number of different hotels that we have stayed in! It is on the smaller side, but how much time do you really spend in your room when in Orlando! The breakfast buffet in the morning was also very nice, and we utilized it every morning of our stay. Although I remained cautious about my experience until we checked out (due to my prior experiences at other hotels), I am more than happy to share with everybody the experience that we had and we will for sure return to this hotel in the future! I also want to note that it was very quiet, and we never heard other guests in the hallway or the rooms next door or above us. And, the girls at the front desk when we checked in and out were very helpful and upbeat! The beds were also very comfortable. Again, most importantly for me, the room, including the bathroom, was extremely clean. Thanks again to the Hampton Inn Lake Beuna Vista Fl!

Reviews.Title: “Very accommodating service staff enabled me to be efficient at work.”
Reviews.Author: ThereseJones
Reviews.Content: I would like to thank you for my recent business trip. Great location and facilities. The staff were very welcoming and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “An excellent place”
Reviews.Author: PanamanianTraveler
Reviews.Content: It is a cozy place. The attention was super all the time and the fact that they have good coffee 24 hours made the experience even better. Check for the promotions they offer all year around.

Reviews.Title: “SUPER”
Reviews.Author: ncflounder
Reviews.Content: Great stay while my wife and I visited Disney. No complaints what-so-ever. Front desk was great from check -in to check-out. Lots of room for breakfast. Room was very clean. Great place to stay....and we are very picky!

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms and service every time we visit”
Reviews.Author: GAtraveler81
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this location several times and are always pleased. The breakfast is great.

Reviews.Title: “WELL TAKEN CARE OF !”
Reviews.Author: HURRICANE85
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel/motel ! but what we liked most was the way our room was taken care of each day ! we stayed in room 536 ! you should give the house keeper a rase and an extra week of vacation ! we have stayed in many motel/hotels before and never have i been so impressed with the way our room was taken care of ! we shall tell everyone of the excellent service we received ! and you should see many people we recommend from the wilmington nc area in the future because of that ! thanks again James K Lewis II

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Inns are always consistant with quality, clean rooms with great beds!”
Reviews.Author: SiestaRealtor
Reviews.Content: There could be a few more computer terminals then two or a time limit as people are checking all the info. for tourist recreation on line and I could not do a quick business check.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service”
Reviews.Author: redsox69
Reviews.Content: I travel frequently for business and flying from Boston to Orlando I realized I had left my wallet at home. I had no cash and no credit cards - just a passport. The good people at the Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista were extremely helpful allowing me to take a cab and charge it to my room while my wallet was sent over-night. Upon arrival I was able to get right into my clean room, jump on the wirelss Internet and successfully accomplish the calls I had scheduled for that afternoon without skipping a beat. They made what was would otherwise have been a very tough morning and afternoon into a comfortable nd productive one. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay Near Disney - AWESOME Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: zogulusnig
Reviews.Content: CHEAP, clean, quiet, close to the parks with shuttle service at the hotel - also, they have a great free breakfast buffet each morning. Staff REALLY goes out of their way to help out - big kudos to Ramon, the manager. He actually drove myself and my mother to Disney when we missed the shuttle one morning.

Reviews.Title: “Caring staff with great service in a wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: Scottie21
Reviews.Content: WE have stayed at this hotel on numerous occasions and have always been pleased with the staff - especially Brandon - the cleanliness of the rooms and general facility - the easy access to the attractions, both Disney properties and Universal/Sea World - the many and diverse selection of restaurants close to this location - the variety of food served at the complimentary breakfast - one of the overall best Hampton Inns we stay at.

Reviews.Title: “highly recommend”
Reviews.Author: sportshark
Reviews.Content: i stay at hamptons all the time, and this one is pretty high on their scale for quality... privacy & quiet, but accessible to disney & surrounding stuff...

Reviews.Title: “Yes, but......”
Reviews.Author: Buckeye460
Reviews.Content: Hampton Inn was somehow mediocre... at best. I really can't say it was a bad stay, but it wasn't good either. On their web site and reservation system, it indicates the hotel is very near Downtown Disney ... I think a customer review site (maybe tripadvisor) indicated one could walk to DD if needed. The hotel certainly not within walking distance nor is it near enough to say "near". The hotel states they have free shuttles to parks. The shuttle left at 8:30 and went to Epcot. You then have to wait on a Disney shuttle to take you to any other parks. We arrived at Magic Kingdom at 10:30 !! Rooms VERY small for a Hampton. Did I say VERY small? Certainly not an adequate room for my self and my 26 yr old daughter and 15 yr old son. I really should have booked at the nearby Embassy Suites. But I have been in many Hamptons Inns with suite sized rooms. Went on Jan.1 so the rate was $169 a night. :-( Mini fridge and micro in the room. Pod type coffee brewer in the bathroom. Clean comfy bedding and plenty of towels. Windows only open 3 inches. Smoking rooms available. I would only recommend this to a solo traveler OR folks who go to Disney at high season with no reservations anywhere

Reviews.Title: “A Top Ten Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: scottr
Reviews.Content: We really liked the location of this Hampton Inn; in a quiet location, yet conveniently located to restaurants, shopping, attractions,and freeways. The staff was unfailingly friendly and helpful, both at the front desk and at the breakfast buffet in the morning. The breakfast buffet was plentiful and tasty and seating was comfortable. Our room was very comfortable and attractive, with a small fridge and microwave. We did not use the pool, as the weather turned rather cool during our stay, but the pool looked clean and inviting. We stay at Hampton Inn's frequently as my husband is a Hilton Honor's member, and this was one of our best stays by far.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: pochophj
Reviews.Content: From the time we arrived until the time we left the whole experience was excellent. We were pleased to receive a call from the manager about five minutes after we arrived in our room to make sure everything was to our liking. When we mentioned that we were going to have dinner at a near-by restaurant, the manager supplied us with a discount coupon. The room was a little larger than some similar rooms we have stayed in at other Hampton Inns. It was very comfortable. The cookies we have come to expect were delicious, as usual. The next morning the breakfast service was the best we have seen at all of the various Hampton Inns we have stayed in in the past. The selections included all of the usual choices plus Mickey Mouse shaped do-it-yourself waffles. The dining area was larger than most we have seen in the past and very comfortable. I have already recommended this Hampton Inn to a couple of friends and will continue to do so in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: kcgrmn
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at this hotel in two weeks; The hotel staff were warm and courteous. Rooms were clean and beds were very comfortable. Other hotels charge for parking, use of a refridgerator, and other resort fees. This hotel had everything included in one low price, including a delicious continental breakfast. There was no shuttle to the hotel, but is within a 10 minute drive to all Disney parks.

Reviews.Title: “Waooooo”
Reviews.Author: herzep
Reviews.Content: Waoooo a great experience the facilities are great the accommodation s make me fell in home . The personal make the effort to my stay was the best of the best and the location of the hotel is in a prime area .To make more easy for all they have so many restaurants an make me save money in gasoline . To finish donâ€™t think twice this is a great Hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Family_Visit0r
Reviews.Content: I get amenities as describe. High speed internet connectivity is very good. Complimentary break fast was very good. Rooms were very clean & service was prompt. Hotel manger helped personally for trip planning & guidance, which you can get from local only. Staff is polite & friendly. Most of parks are within 4-5 miles radius. Neighborhood is also quite. Many restaurants near by complex and open till 10-11 PM so can get dinner after visiting parks. Overall rating is excellent. Best value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value and friendly services”
Reviews.Author: mikechoy
Reviews.Content: Warm and friendly staff. Good services for the money. Love the breakfast and convenient location to restaurants. Close to Disney and Sea World.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: KuwaitGlobetrotters
Reviews.Content: We researched the hotel on the Hilton website before checking in and found the rate at $69+tax for a room with 2 doubles and $79+tax for 2 doubles with a fridge & microwave. We walked in and asked for their rate and were told it was $79. When we asked if they had any without a fridge or microwave for $69 we were told they all have fridges and microwaves but he would honour the rate! I don't think this would have been offered if we hadn't challenged it. The room was standard Hampton Inn, clean and with a decent bathroom. Free wireless internet was available throughout the hotel and a business centre if you didn't carry your own laptop. Breakfast was good with cereals, yoghurt, juices, pastries and a couple of hot items. Previous reviews have mentioned the location. Although it is a good walk to the restaurants along Apopka Vineland (Red Lobster, Perkins, Olive Garden etc) we did walk, although we would recommend a car for this location. All the staff at the hotel were very friendly but we eventually stayed only 1 night although we had originally booked for 4, as we discovered they were doing a special 4 for the price of 3 offer - but we hadn't been offered this. At the same time we found the Quality Suites next door were doing an exceptional deal on a 1 bed apartment (booked on Booking.com) so we checked out after the first night and moved next door. Saying this, we agreed that if we had been offered the 4 for 3 deal on check in, we would have probably stayed for the four nights.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean, Courteous Staff”
Reviews.Author: KyTravelPro
Reviews.Content: Our stay here was very pleasant. Staff was knowledgeable, courteous and friendly in every aspect. Our room was very clean and tastefully appointed. Continental breakfast was very good. We would only stay here again, however, if we had our own vehicle. We asked about complimentary transportation to restaurants within the near radius. They offer no complimentary transportation within the area and restaurants are not real close. They do, however, have complimentary transportation to WDW. On our first day to ride the shuttle the bus driver was not real observant with his stops. He did not come in and see if anyone was waiting. We missed the bus and had to walk across/down the street to meet up with him in order to get a ride to WDW. The bus was filthy dirty, seats were torn and I actually worried about lice and bed bugs in the seat it was so dirty. Also, the schedule did not work well for us for return at the park closing time. There was a lot of wait time for the last bus after the park closed. Upon arrival on our first day we asked them to call a cab for us so we could go eat. They said they could not call a cab for us because they were tied in with the shuttle service company that provides transportation to WDW. We asked them to get us a ride. This service was very expensive for the distance we went. Fee almost as much as a meal. On another occasion we asked them how much a cab fare would be. They could not tell us. We did get the phone number for Yellow Cab [--] and called ourself. The fare was just several dollars plus gratuity. My suggestion would be to use Yellow Cab in lieu of their transportation mode. This is our only complaint. If we had had our own transportation everything would have been great. I would definitely stay again if we had a vehicle.

Reviews.Title: “Good, clean stay”
Reviews.Author: Lisa091
Reviews.Content: Clean comfortable room. Breakfast food was good. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with nice staff and comfortable beds”
Reviews.Author: tlayman
Reviews.Content: We recently got back from our 3-night stay at this hotel and it was great. The hot tub (which is really hot, but just the way I like it) was the perfect place to relax after a day at Disney. The beds are so comfortable you sleep like a baby. I wasn't feeling great on our trip as I had the beginnings of a head cold/sinus infection but still I was able to get good nights sleep. You can't hear much noise from adjacent rooms. The staff was friendly, too. I think Daniel was the one who checked us in and he was so nice. The breakfast was nice, but I had read a review that said at one point they had mickey shaped waffles. This was no longer the case. But the variety was still good -- they just had a hard time one morning keeping it stocked as fast as people were taking it. Of course, the hotel seemed busy as it was Thanksgiving week. The only thing I didn't like -- which is nothing against the hotel but rather hilton policy -- was I booked through a third party website and they wouldn't allow me to get hilton points for my stay.

Reviews.Title: “Grrrrrrreat!”
Reviews.Author: 4intampa
Reviews.Content: My family and I experienced a wonderful time at Hampton Inn Lake Buena Vista. We enjoyed the breakfast each morning as we started our day. The choices were wide and plentyful. The service we received were excellent. We were greeted by Christina who was friendly and very helpful. She gave us suggestions on different sights to see to include directions. My family and I were attending a soccer tournament at Wide World of Sports when we returned from our event...our room was clean and fresh towels were placed in the bathroom. As a whole, my family and I enjoyed the friendly and helpful service we received. We really enjoyed the breakfast...one suggestion...you may want to include a waffle station. (smile)

Reviews.Title: “The next best alternative to a 5 star hotel without the expense.”
Reviews.Author: pebblesmrf
Reviews.Content: Everything was perfect except for the oversight upon check-in that I wasn't informed about the shuttle service that is provided to the theme parks. Something I feel is extremely important to convey to guests. I could've saved some money and not paid for parking. But, we're all human and everyone makes mistakes. Besides, it was also an oversight on my part since there's a sign (left hand side) at the Front Desk about the Shuttle Service Schedule which I overlooked. Regardless, the hotel is conveniently located and the staff are extremely courteous and professional. The hotel also offers one of the best breakfast buffets. Put all this together and it made up for that minor inconvenience. I definitely rate this hotel a 5 all the way.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCATION,EXCELLANT VALUE,WONDERFUL STAFF”
Reviews.Author: TINKERBELL1948
Reviews.Content: Room was excellant and hotel was very clean.. Staff was very helpful with directions and places to see. Excellant value for the money and included as usual a wonderful breakfast Lots of restaurants in the area to choose from. 5 minutes from Disney. Couldn't ask for more convenience.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing service and value!!”
Reviews.Author: SleepingBeauty78
Reviews.Content: We checked in late at night, and the front desk associate was extremely helpful and friendly. The hotel was extremely clean,rooms very super comfy and modern (duvets on the beds were cozy). We had a great night's sleep, it was very quiet. Breakfast and internet were INCLUDED:)... The breakfast buffet style, excellent selection - sausage, french toast, omelettes, yogurt, fruit, muffins, cereal, coffee, hot chocolate, juice, etc... When we were finished, a manager came and checked how our meal was and offered us each a box of mints from a basket. We enjoyed it so much, we decided to stay an extra night. Will definitely stay here again, as it's very close to Disney and the best outlet mall. in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Cookiesmom
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area. The staff is very friendly and the rooms are comfortable and clean!!!

Reviews.Title: “A Quiet, Clean, Comfortable Experience!”
Reviews.Author: Beverlymarie
Reviews.Content: We were thrilled with our choice of hotel. We have stayed in Hampton's before and your reputation precede's you! I love the fact that we rarely hear noise from another room. The rooms are spotless and in good order. My only complaint, if you can call it that, is that I wish there was more choice of pillow. My husband likes a flat one and not so puffy and "high" up. I found, too, that my head sunk into each pillow I tried and just could not get comfortable with it. But part of the problem is that we are in our 50's and miss our own bed, pillows, etc. when away from home. My other comment is the outside whirlpool. It was not very warm and we got out after 10 minutes as we felt chilled in it. I would like to mention one particular employee at the front desk named Daniel. He was extremely helpful and friendly. We had a lot of questions for him and he handled everything beautifully. Over all, the hotel was a great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Novaman123
Reviews.Content: To put it simple great stay, wonderful staff, clean rooms, and the breakfast was more than I expected.

Reviews.Title: “Everything you need at a great price!”
Reviews.Author: southerntierNYGizzy
Reviews.Content: great location to Disney, Sea World, airport, food! Staff was ALWAYS smiling, helpful and courteous. Breakfast buffet well stocked, including the USA Today! (the evening coffee in the lobby hit the spot). Room & bathroom spacious, with everything we needed. Not many places call within 15 minutes of check-in to see if the room was acceptable!

Reviews.Title: “Soccer moms staying for college tournament at Disney”
Reviews.Author: soccermome
Reviews.Content: We found Hampton Inn/Orlando Lake Buena Vista to be over above our expectations. Our daughters were staying at a Disney Resort Hotel with their team and we found this Hampton Inn to be very convenient to their hotel, Wide World of Sports and any other Disney area we wished to travel to. Everything was within 10-15 minutes away. Not only was the price very affordable but the staff always courteous and willing to assist. Rooms were clean and whenever we asked for additional towels, etc our requests were taken care of promptly. Never having to worry about breakfast in the morning was another plus as well as the many restaurants in the neighboring area. We have stayed in many hotels with our soccer travels and would rate this Hampton Inn as one of the best. Truly a great find!!! Would stay again and hope to soon.

Reviews.Title: “Disney Delight”
Reviews.Author: StumpWorldwide
Reviews.Content: Clean, great service. Great hot breakfast every day. We met with friends at the pool and the kids had a blast in the hot tub one evening. We picked up pizza and had fun with our friends using the breakfast/dining area. Another family had been playing cards in the same area the night before. The family loved the hot chocolate each night before we turned in. We would go back and would send others!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good place - near conference and Disney attractions”
Reviews.Author: heart
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel while attending a conference at the nearby Hilton at Disneyworld. Rates at the Hampton were much better than the Hilton rates, although a rental car was necessary to quickly move from one hotel to the other (it is a mile or more). The rooms, building, staff, and public areas were all at the usual high quality I expect from a Hapton Inn. Breakfast was OK, with some hot items and plenty of food. After 5 days it does seem a bit tired since there is no variation in the items. However, as breakfast is included in the price, and the cost of dining in the area is high, it is a great deal. There are plenty of chain restaurants nearby; unfortunately not much in the way of interesting non-chain places to get a feeling for the local culture. Overall, the price I paid (prepaid 5 days, about $75.50/night incl tax) was good and the quality was as expected for a Hampton Inn - very nice.

HotelInfo.Name: Hampton Inn Orlando/Lake Buena Vista
HotelInfo.Address: 8150 Palm Parkway, Orlando, FL 32836
